entity.marker.13.talk.1.1: Husks and souls polluted by miasma...
entity.marker.13.talk.2.1: Will twist into entirely different species...
entity.marker.13.talk.4.1: The Deathbeast before your eyes... wielding dual black and white swords...
entity.marker.13.talk.5.1: Reminds you of an anecdote about a hero from the past...
entity.marker.13.talk.6.1: Sighing at the fickleness of fate... you ready your holy sword to send it on its way...
entity.marker.14.talk.2.1: A path as thin as silk extends to the other side...
entity.marker.14.talk.3.1: Deathbeasts guard both sides of the room...
entity.marker.14.talk.4.1: It is worth crossing... for a rare relic lies on the other side to tempt you forward!
entity.marker.14.talk.5.1: But it will be difficult... you decide to...
entity.marker.21.talk.2.1: This is a strange space... Peaceful? No... Solemn.
entity.marker.21.talk.3.1: A strange aura makes the dark beasts avoid this room,
entity.marker.21.talk.4.1: Undoubtedly, there is an entity here...
entity.marker.21.talk.5.1: Or a place where something terrible once existed...
entity.marker.21.talk.6.1: But that [Entity] is not here now... in this place the dark beasts dare not approach...
entity.marker.21.talk.7.1: It is undoubtedly safe... so you decide to...
entity.marker.30.talk.2.1: In this room... you feel a massive pulse of life.
entity.marker.30.talk.3.1: A Fountain of Life? No, not something so trustworthy...
entity.marker.30.talk.4.1: Huge life force drips from a demonic cocoon...
entity.marker.30.talk.5.1: Is this a nursery? A dining hall?
entity.marker.30.talk.6.1: You cannot judge... but the life force surging from the cocoon
entity.marker.30.talk.8.1: You decide to drink in moderation.
entity.marker.31.talk.2.1: As soon as you enter... the entrance is sealed by iron bars...
entity.marker.31.talk.3.1: A raised pedestal holds a special relic...
entity.marker.31.talk.4.1: As if saying... take it and you can leave this room...
entity.marker.31.talk.5.1: But... you examine the room and see many strange skulls.
entity.marker.31.talk.6.1: As if saying... things are not that simple.
entity.marker.31.talk.7.1: Then... as if to prove this, quickly...
entity.marker.31.talk.8.1: Deathbeasts begin to surge from the sides!
entity.marker.32.talk.2.1: During the exploration of the Black City...
entity.marker.32.talk.3.1: You arrived at what looks like a residential area,
entity.marker.32.talk.4.1: In its depths... a crimson spring...
entity.marker.32.talk.5.1: Huge life power churns within the spring...
entity.marker.32.talk.6.1: You have a premonition... staying in this abnormal spring
entity.marker.32.talk.7.1: Your power could be further enhanced...
entity.marker.32.talk.8.1: But... staying too long risks being ambushed by Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.32.talk.10.1: 《*Challenge ends 15 seconds after everyone leaves the spring.》
entity.marker.64.talk.2.1: In the darkness, a giant eye stares at a magic sword in the room...
entity.marker.64.talk.3.1: The sword, stared at by the blood-red eye, floats up and down...
entity.marker.64.talk.4.1: As if trying to break free from its bindings...
entity.marker.64.talk.5.1: Currently, the magic eye does not react to intruders...
entity.marker.64.talk.6.1: You hesitate... should you help the magic sword break free?
entity.marker.77.talk.2.1: The moment you entered the room, your mind understood...
entity.marker.77.talk.3.1: This is a sweet yet terrible trap...
entity.marker.77.talk.4.1: Here you can obtain powerful relics...
entity.marker.77.talk.5.1: As long as you offer your fresh blood...
entity.marker.78.talk.2.1: The heroic spirits who give trials to challengers...
entity.marker.78.talk.3.1: They are possessors of strong will...
entity.marker.78.talk.4.1: Through unbreaking will and the authority of the Elf King...
entity.marker.78.talk.5.1: They crossed the River Styx to come here.
entity.marker.79.talk.2.2: The fat sheep is here again!
entity.marker.79.talk.3.1: You were ambushed as soon as you entered the chamber...
entity.marker.79.talk.4.1: It seems to be the infamous Twilight Bandits,
entity.marker.79.talk.5.1: Having not heard of them on the continent for so long, turns out they hid in this underground labyrinth...
entity.marker.79.talk.6.2: Hehe... don't think you'll die painlessly!
entity.marker.79.talk.7.2: Hand over your treasures, and become slaves!
entity.marker.89.talk.2.1: Advancing through the Black City... you see the skeleton of a colossal beast.
entity.marker.89.talk.3.1: Behemoth? Dragon? Or some creature that once existed?
entity.marker.89.talk.4.1: But in the realm of death, this has no meaning. Their final fate is but to die...
entity.marker.89.talk.5.1: And become an existence replaced by Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.104.talk.2.1: Beasts transformed from those devoured by the Demon King...
entity.marker.104.talk.3.1: Their minds are lost... seeing beasts as companions and humans as enemies...
entity.marker.104.talk.4.1: As if they have become completely different creatures...
entity.marker.104.talk.5.1: But the worst part is that their skills remain intact...
entity.marker.104.talk.6.1: In the early stages of the invasion... this was the reason for humanity's rapid defeat...
entity.marker.106.talk.1.1: Deathbeast... that is what is devoured by the Demon King...
entity.marker.106.talk.3.1: Mixing parts, consciousness, and skills of various creatures...
entity.marker.106.talk.4.1: It does not live for life, but for death.
entity.marker.106.talk.5.1: The purpose of all its actions is only to assist the Demon King in devouring all things...
entity.marker.106.talk.6.1: An unhatched egg is inserted in the center of the room before your eyes...
entity.marker.106.talk.7.1: To stop the birth of the Deathbeast, you decide to destroy the egg...
entity.marker.106.talk.10.1: A young Deathbeast still emerges from the egg to attack you...
entity.marker.107.talk.2.1: The more you explore the Black City, the more wrong it feels...
entity.marker.107.talk.3.1: The Demon King is an existence like the incarnation of a natural disaster...
entity.marker.107.talk.4.1: He and his kin exist only for destruction...
entity.marker.107.talk.5.1: Thinking like this, the scene before you is wrong...
entity.marker.107.talk.6.1: In a small corner of the Black City lies farmland...
entity.marker.107.talk.7.1: Growing precious plants that can survive even under the miasma...
entity.marker.107.talk.8.1: You are not a scholar and cannot know the truth,
entity.marker.107.talk.9.1: But if you use these plants... maybe they can help in subsequent battles,
entity.marker.146.talk.1.1: Continuing along the ruined path... towards the depths of the cave
entity.marker.146.talk.2.1: Although you believe that you can find the Holy Sword this way...
entity.marker.146.talk.3.1: But... is it true? Sometimes you can't help but doubt
entity.marker.146.talk.5.1: Another group of obstacles appears ahead...
entity.marker.146.talk.6.1: Engage them... only at this moment can you put aside your doubts...
entity.marker.147.talk.1.1: Continuing the exploration... unfolding before your eyes is
entity.marker.147.talk.3.1: Boiling lava rolls on both sides...
entity.marker.147.talk.5.1: And countless enemies on the walkway are clearly prepared...
entity.marker.147.talk.6.1: To drag you into the abyss...
entity.marker.152.talk.2.1: The heavy door behind you suddenly slams shut...
entity.marker.152.talk.3.1: Unknowingly, another enemy has appeared in the room...
entity.marker.152.talk.4.1: 'Intellect'... No... such a refined adjective shouldn't be used...
entity.marker.152.talk.5.1: You sense from this strong enemy before you... a 'treacherous' aura.
entity.marker.152.talk.6.1: Unlike ordinary Deathbeasts that entangle upon sight...
entity.marker.152.talk.7.1: This beast before you knows how to establish its own territory.
entity.marker.152.talk.8.1: And then toy with its opponent until death...
entity.marker.152.talk.9.1: You have a premonition that a fierce battle is about to begin...
entity.marker.182.talk.2.2: The ceiling of this room is higher than you think.
entity.marker.182.talk.4.1: Look towards the gaps between the ceilings.
entity.marker.182.talk.5.1: Layers upon layers of complex patterns prevent you from seeing the true zenith.
entity.marker.182.talk.6.2: This trial is simple, I will cast a levitation spell on you.
entity.marker.182.talk.7.2: And you must desperately squeeze through the gaps in the sky to reach a higher position.
entity.marker.186.talk.2.1: The entire room is covered by chaotic waters...
entity.marker.186.talk.3.1: Just as you were lamenting the difficult path...
entity.marker.186.talk.4.1: Countless auras rush out from the side...
entity.marker.186.talk.5.1: A warrior does not choose the battlefield... you ready your sword!
entity.marker.201.talk.2.1: The trial is about to begin...
entity.marker.201.talk.3.1: Heroes who remain in the world through the Elf King's authority are raising their weapons against you...
entity.marker.201.talk.4.1: This is a trial... and also an inheritance... the heroic spirits display their skills...
entity.marker.201.talk.5.1: And you... need to learn them, and... surpass them!
entity.marker.206.talk.1.1: A straight long path... straight upwards,
entity.marker.206.talk.2.1: A bad sound comes from the distance...
entity.marker.206.talk.4.1: Giant boulders rolling from the upper level!
entity.marker.206.talk.5.1: If you get hit, the consequences will be dire...
entity.marker.231.talk.1.1: In the Black City surrounded by deathly miasma...
entity.marker.231.talk.2.1: This place is exceptionally full of 'vitality'...
entity.marker.231.talk.3.1: Crimson eggs on the ceiling are pulsating...
entity.marker.231.talk.4.1: Presumably, the contents won't be anything good for humans...
entity.marker.231.talk.5.1: You ready your bow and prepare to destroy the eggs,
entity.marker.231.talk.7.1: At the same time, a huge beastly shadow appears from the other end of the room!
entity.marker.231.talk.8.1: It seems the owner of the eggs... has taken action to protect them!
entity.marker.237.talk.2.1: The Elf Shrine is located in the boundary land closest to life and death...
entity.marker.237.talk.3.1: The Nether in the underworld, and the battlefield in the living world...
entity.marker.237.talk.4.1: This is the place closest to the Demon... and also where heroic spirits most easily appear.
entity.marker.237.talk.5.1: Forward lies the realm of death, so those who lost the qualification to challenge the Demon King... can now only impose trials on challengers here...
entity.marker.247.talk.3.1: Said the heroic spirit in the center of the Trial Chamber.
entity.marker.247.talk.4.2: No matter how unreasonable the Demon King is... he will inevitably fall under his sword.
entity.marker.247.talk.5.2: Even though... I died from a sneak attack in that battle and couldn't witness the result.
entity.marker.247.talk.6.2: But I know no matter what... he will claim victory.
entity.marker.247.talk.7.1: Speaking of an illusion detached from reality...
entity.marker.247.talk.8.1: If the 'he' he spoke of really defeated the Demon King...
entity.marker.247.talk.9.1: The world would have been at peace long ago... and there would be no need for these trials...
entity.marker.247.talk.10.2: Don't you believe it? Then do you want to test your skills against me?
entity.marker.250.talk.2.1: The forefront of the fight against the Demon King's army.
entity.marker.250.talk.3.1: The heroic warriors summoned back by the Elf King...
entity.marker.250.talk.4.1: Are now attacking to test you...
entity.marker.251.talk.1.1: Walking in the seemingly endless tunnel...
entity.marker.251.talk.2.1: But you, searching for the Holy Sword, know well...
entity.marker.251.talk.3.1: To avoid detection by the Demon King, the Sage would definitely not hide the Holy Sword shallowly.
entity.marker.251.talk.4.1: Ahead is another tunnel leading deeper...
entity.marker.251.talk.5.1: Countless bugs wriggle inside the tunnel...
entity.marker.255.talk.4.1: A loud noise comes from the bottom of the bottomless abyss.
entity.marker.255.talk.6.2: Worship... The Guardian Statue of the Holy Sword - Worship!
entity.marker.255.talk.7.1: You have arrived at the deepest part of the cave...
entity.marker.255.talk.8.1: Just as the legend says... the Holy Sword sleeps here!
entity.marker.255.talk.9.2: Adventurer... show your strength, prove you are qualified to wield the Holy Sword!
entity.marker.255.talk.10.1: You will obtain the Holy Sword...
entity.marker.257.talk.2.1: In the present, chased by countless Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.257.talk.3.1: You have come to this room with no retreat...
entity.marker.257.talk.4.1: The pursuing Deathbeasts have arrived, and you decide...
entity.marker.258.talk.1.1: Clutching your weapon... and only a few arrows left.
entity.marker.258.talk.2.1: Stepping carefully on the walkways of the Black City...
entity.marker.258.talk.3.1: You cannot rest for a moment in the city...
entity.marker.258.talk.6.1: You raise your weapon against the oncoming enemies.
entity.marker.270.talk.3.1: Making movement in the room difficult...
entity.marker.270.talk.4.1: But the room is full of Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.303.talk.3.1: Time is running out, you must make a choice....
entity.marker.310.talk.1.1: During the exploration of the Black City... you found this room...
entity.marker.310.talk.2.1: Although abandoned now... you can tell it was once a workshop.
entity.marker.310.talk.3.1: Examining the minerals stained black by miasma...
entity.marker.310.talk.4.1: Using these materials might strengthen your attack power...
entity.marker.310.talk.5.1: But using miasma-tainted materials comes with a price....
entity.marker.357.talk.2.1: Entering the room... a massive sense of oppression hits you directly...
entity.marker.357.talk.4.2: But thou must be a hero, not a thief.
entity.marker.357.talk.5.2: This is the will of my master who perished in the netherworld!
entity.marker.357.talk.6.1: The statue's master was unfortunately critically wounded during the Black City exploration...
entity.marker.357.talk.7.1: So they deposited the relics they held and the guardian statue here...
entity.marker.357.talk.8.1: If you are interested in what its master carried...
entity.marker.357.talk.9.2: Then take it, but thou must defeat me!
entity.marker.357.talk.10.1: The way to prove yourself a hero and not a thief is to defeat the statue...
entity.marker.362.talk.3.1: Creatures like Deathbeasts are like chaos...
entity.marker.362.talk.4.1: Mixing creatures devoured by the Demon King...
entity.marker.362.talk.5.1: And then birthing brand new beasts from these corpses...
entity.marker.362.talk.6.1: What you face are monsters born against the laws of nature...
entity.marker.417.talk.2.1: The trials in the shrine are not simple...
entity.marker.417.talk.3.1: You are surprised by the power of the trial enemies - the Heroic Spirits you encountered here.
entity.marker.417.talk.4.1: As your view opens up, you enter a new room, and at the same time... start a new trial!
entity.marker.421.talk.2.1: Ruins of the Brilliant Era existing deep in the cave...
entity.marker.421.talk.3.1: Each could be a hint to the location of the Holy Sword,
entity.marker.421.talk.4.1: Especially this ruin before you, its structure is particularly intact...
entity.marker.421.talk.5.1: It may be dangerous... but you don't want to miss it!
entity.marker.421.talk.6.2: Warning! No lingering here without permission!
entity.marker.421.talk.7.1: You are ready to face the powerful guards in the ruins!
entity.marker.422.talk.1.1: Following a map found accidentally in other ruins...
entity.marker.422.talk.2.1: This place used to be a huge treasury...
entity.marker.422.talk.3.1: However, you only see a desolate water area
entity.marker.422.talk.4.1: It seems that topographical changes occurred over the long ages.
entity.marker.435.talk.2.1: Peeking into the chamber from the crack in the door,
entity.marker.435.talk.3.1: Countless guards are aiming their bows at the entrance...
entity.marker.435.talk.4.1: This seems to be an important facility of the Brilliant Era...
entity.marker.435.talk.5.1: That's why so many guards are deployed for defense...
entity.marker.442.talk.2.1: After a long exploration you came to a chamber...
entity.marker.442.talk.3.1: A huge stone statue stands in the center of the room
entity.marker.442.talk.5.1: It is one of the ancient weapons made to fight the Demon King
entity.marker.442.talk.6.1: During the Brilliant Era - same period as the Prophet.
entity.marker.442.talk.7.1: The existence of the Golem proves... the Holy Sword is indeed buried here.
entity.marker.442.talk.8.1: But you dare not let your guard down... because the guardian statue has already discovered your presence!
entity.marker.444.talk.1.1: Following the messy path found by chance...
entity.marker.444.talk.2.1: But an attack was still inevitable
entity.marker.444.talk.4.1: A group of monsters occupies the road ahead,
entity.marker.444.talk.5.1: An unavoidable battle with you has occurred!
entity.marker.446.talk.1.1: The cave floor is muddy and difficult to walk on...
entity.marker.446.talk.2.1: Stepping with unstable paces, you continue to advance...
entity.marker.446.talk.5.1: You also have to deal with the incoming monsters...
entity.marker.467.talk.2.1: Raise the Holy Sword, awaken your partners...
entity.marker.467.talk.3.1: Seeing the pitch-black creature before you... you understood.
entity.marker.467.talk.4.1: That is the Demon King... the Lord of Destruction of the Eternal World.
entity.marker.467.talk.5.1: It is the target that the Holy Sword in your hand should subjugate.
entity.marker.467.talk.6.1: But how much power can a human exert before the Chaos Lord...
entity.marker.467.talk.7.1: How many heroes in the past reached this step but still failed...
entity.marker.467.talk.8.1: Discard your doubts and focus on the battle before you. Having experienced adventure, you are invincible.
entity.marker.493.talk.2.1: Stairs leading to the depths of the Black City...
entity.marker.493.talk.3.1: Looking into the depths, you have already seen the kin of the Demon King...
entity.marker.493.talk.5.1: But... what reason do you have not to advance?
entity.marker.502.talk.1.1: Leaping into the deep pit at the top of the Elf Shrine...
entity.marker.502.talk.2.1: You arrive at the core of the Elf Shrine... the final Trial Chamber!
entity.marker.502.talk.4.2: I am the ferryman between the Nether and the Living World...
entity.marker.502.talk.5.2: The only remaining solitary king of elves in the Living World...
entity.marker.502.talk.6.1: In the decades since the collapse of the Brilliant Era...
entity.marker.502.talk.7.1: Elves and humans joined hands and did their utmost to defeat the Demon King...
entity.marker.502.talk.9.2: Defeat me, otherwise even with the blessing...
entity.marker.502.talk.10.2: Your strength is not enough to defeat the Demon King who is stronger than I.
entity.marker.502.talk.11.1: The result of the battle with the Demon King was a crushing defeat...
entity.marker.502.talk.12.1: Only the 'cowardly' Elf survived without fighting...
entity.marker.502.talk.13.1: But ironically, precisely because she didn't sacrifice herself in battle...
entity.marker.502.talk.14.1: The authority she holds can inherit the thoughts of the dead...
entity.marker.502.talk.15.1: Establishing a final line of defense for humanity...
entity.marker.502.talk.16.2: Spend the rest of your life under my protection.
entity.marker.502.talk.17.2: I no longer wish to see... anyone sacrificed at the hands of the Demon King.
entity.marker.512.talk.2.1: A brightly lit space... vast and unobstructed,
entity.marker.512.talk.3.1: But the person standing here... does not fit this space at all.
entity.marker.512.talk.4.2: If we fight on my home turf, it wouldn't be a trial but a massacre!
entity.marker.512.talk.5.1: The Shadow Hero who went deep into enemy territory alone to assassinate and destroy - Shadow.
entity.marker.512.talk.6.1: His espionage and sabotage actions caused huge blows to the Demon King's army invasion.
entity.marker.512.talk.7.2: Try to catch me, otherwise you can't possibly defeat the Demon King.
entity.marker.538.talk.3.1: On the colorful giant playground, a heroic spirit stands.
entity.marker.538.talk.4.2: When you walk across this playground, the ground below will turn gold.
entity.marker.538.talk.5.2: And I will turn it red.
entity.marker.538.talk.6.2: The trial is simple, if the number of gold tiles below is greater than red after 30 seconds, you win.
entity.marker.538.talk.7.2: You wouldn't refuse a contest with me, would you?
entity.marker.542.talk.1.1: Entered a room decorated in dark tones...
entity.marker.542.talk.2.2: This is the Trial of Sealing...
entity.marker.542.talk.3.2: In this trial, the one of your five abilities you are most proud of will be sealed...
entity.marker.542.talk.6.2: If you succeed... I will offer you a reward...
entity.marker.543.talk.1.1: Challenger! Go to the other side of the Trial Chamber.
entity.marker.543.talk.3.1: Countless heroic spirits stand on the arrow towers, granting trials to adventurers.
entity.marker.543.talk.4.1: Advance by stepping on the walls, testing balance and judgment.
entity.marker.543.talk.5.1: Shuttle through arrow formations and stone pillars to find the correct path.
entity.marker.544.talk.2.1: Bubbling sounds come from deep in the room.
entity.marker.544.talk.3.1: Bright red liquid boils in a huge iron cauldron.
entity.marker.544.talk.6.2: You want it! Hmm... hmm... I hear you saying you want it!
entity.marker.544.talk.7.2: But it's troublesome! The brewing of this potion requires a price.... You'll pay it, right!
entity.marker.566.talk.1.1: In the search of the endless cave....
entity.marker.566.talk.2.1: You came to a hidden water source....
entity.marker.566.talk.4.1: Small fish swim full of life in the water
entity.marker.614.talk.2.1: The goal in this shrine is very clear...
entity.marker.614.talk.3.1: Pass the trial to get the Elf King's approval...
entity.marker.614.talk.4.1: So engage... clear all obstacles ahead!
entity.marker.618.talk.3.1: This is a Trial Chamber full of abnormalities,
entity.marker.618.talk.4.1: Unlike other Trial Chambers, it is built of pure white marble.
entity.marker.618.talk.5.1: The result of being attracted and walking in is seeing... it.
entity.marker.618.talk.6.2: You need the Elf's blessing to defeat the Demon King?
entity.marker.618.talk.7.2: No, no need for that kind of thing!
entity.marker.618.talk.8.2: Trade with me! I will give you power surpassing the Elf's blessing!
entity.marker.640.talk.2.1: You believe the rumor, the Holy Sword must be here....
entity.marker.640.talk.3.1: You notice a faint light ahead of a fork in the deep cave
entity.marker.640.talk.4.1: Moving forward.... although not the Holy Sword, you found treasure.
entity.marker.640.talk.5.1: Take it.... presumably it will help with the subsequent adventure!
entity.marker.666.talk.1.1: Precious gold and emeralds cover the entire cave chamber,
entity.marker.666.talk.2.1: This seems to be a place where treasures of the Brilliant Era are buried,
entity.marker.666.talk.3.1: If in a peaceful era, a small corner of the treasure in this room,
entity.marker.666.talk.4.1: Would be enough wealth to last a lifetime,
entity.marker.666.talk.5.1: But for you seeking the Holy Sword, it is undoubtedly a burden,
entity.marker.666.talk.6.1: You only select a handy item from it....
entity.marker.666.talk.7.1: And leave the room without any attachment....
entity.marker.667.data.item.lore.0.1: Every time a monster is defeated,
entity.marker.667.data.item.lore.1.1: Slowly restore half a heart over four seconds.
entity.marker.669.data.item.lore.1.1: Assisting silverfish will be generated from its corpse.
entity.marker.670.data.item.lore.1.1: Deal piercing reflection damage equal to three times the damage taken to all enemies on the field.
entity.marker.671.data.item.lore.0.1: Drawing the bow for more than four seconds adds a skill to the arrow,
entity.marker.671.data.item.lore.1.1: Double attack power and significantly knocks back enemies.
entity.marker.672.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase own damage based on degree of injury,
entity.marker.673.data.item.lore.0.1: Those who greedily plundered all relics,
entity.marker.674.data.item.lore.0.1: Slightly increase damage when attacking with a sword by 1 point
entity.marker.675.data.item.lore.0.1: Slightly increase swing speed when attacking with a sword by 10%
entity.marker.677.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase piercing damage when attacking with a sword by 0.5 points
entity.marker.678.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase crit chance when attacking by 1%.
entity.marker.679.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase crit damage when attacking by 10%.
entity.marker.680.data.item.lore.0.1: Slightly increase max HP by 4 points
entity.marker.681.data.item.lore.0.1: Slightly increase armor value by 1 point
entity.marker.689.data.item.lore.0.1: Significantly increase damage when attacking with a sword by 2 points
entity.marker.690.data.item.lore.0.1: Significantly increase swing speed when attacking with a sword by 20%
entity.marker.692.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase piercing damage when attacking with a sword by 1 point
entity.marker.693.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase crit chance when attacking by 2%.
entity.marker.694.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase crit damage when attacking by 20%.
entity.marker.695.data.item.lore.0.1: Significantly increase max HP by 8 points
entity.marker.696.data.item.lore.0.1: Significantly increase armor value by 2 points
entity.marker.704.data.item.lore.0.1: Sword strikes beyond the fifth consecutive hit in place,
entity.marker.705.data.item.lore.0.1: When jumping from the floor, give enemies within three blocks
entity.marker.705.data.item.lore.1.1: A shockwave damage equivalent to own armor value.
entity.marker.705.data.item.lore.2.1: And knock back enemies within four blocks.
entity.marker.706.data.item.lore.0.1: Give targets critically hit by self a seven second stun,
entity.marker.707.data.item.lore.0.1: Add piercing damage to arrow attacks.
entity.marker.708.data.item.lore.0.1: Give all pets a 1 point recovery effect for five seconds.

block.sign.24.front_text2.1: Use Jump Key on Slime Block
entity.marker.759.talk.0.1: You stepped into the cave where the Holy Sword is buried
entity.marker.759.talk.1.1: To defeat the Demon King, the help of the Holy Sword is essential
entity.marker.759.talk.2.1: Determined.... you stepped into the depths
entity.text_display.1.text.1: —Battle Room, Annihilate all monster groups. 《2 Stats <Rarity+> Reward》
entity.text_display.1.text.2: —Strong Enemy Room, Defeat strong enemy to complete challenge. 《2 Stats + 1 Relic Reward》
entity.text_display.1.text.4: —Reward Room, Get reward. 《2 Stats <Rarity++> or 1 Relic Reward》
entity.text_display.1.text.5: Only after the Battle Room can you choose to Camp Rest or Scout Ahead.
entity.text_display.1.text.6: Scout Ahead must be used while standing on the room tile, can replace that room type.
entity.marker.769.talk.1.1: Crossing the battlefield where heroic spirits and Deathbeasts crossed blades,
entity.marker.769.talk.2.1: Traversing the dead lands under the protection of the blessing...
entity.marker.769.talk.3.1: Here... is the place of the final decisive battle...
entity.marker.774.talk.2.1: The Demon King who brings deathly silence to all living things,
entity.marker.774.talk.3.1: And his subordinates... pitch-black creatures that replace living things...
entity.marker.782.talk.1.1: The Black City surrounded by miasma... during exploration you encountered this room...
entity.marker.782.talk.2.1: Inside are stored various relics emitting powerful auras...
entity.marker.782.talk.3.1: Although you want to take them all, there isn't much time to adapt to the relic's power...
entity.marker.782.talk.4.1: You decide to pick one and then leave...
entity.marker.822.talk.1.1: What comes into view is a huge cave chamber
entity.marker.822.talk.2.1: Visitors who came before.... attacked by unknown things, have turned into corpses....
entity.marker.822.talk.3.1: Snap, you stepped into the chamber.... immediately strange noises came from the corpses.
entity.marker.822.talk.5.1: You understood.... the cause of their death!
entity.marker.825.talk.2.1: The Holy Sword sleeping deep in the cave
entity.marker.825.talk.4.1: And he was one of them....
entity.marker.825.talk.5.1: You have heard of his valor and might countless times...
entity.marker.825.talk.6.2: You think you can obtain the Holy Sword?
entity.marker.825.talk.7.2: Don't make me laugh, let me beat you out of this unrealistic dream!
entity.marker.831.talk.2.1: Clear spring water flows from the rock cracks
entity.marker.831.talk.3.1: Clear greenery fills the entire chamber with vitality.
entity.marker.831.talk.4.1: As if forgetting the world crisis.... a paradise
entity.marker.831.talk.5.1: Center of the chamber.... stands a colossus.
entity.marker.831.talk.6.1: You recognize it.... it was left behind by people called the Brilliant Era
entity.marker.831.talk.7.1: Ancient weapon to fight the Demon King.... Guardian Statue
entity.marker.831.talk.8.1: But now it is obviously damaged and difficult to move....
entity.marker.837.talk.3.1: Although you don't know where the end is....
entity.marker.852.talk.3.1: This is a ruin full of abnormalities,
entity.marker.852.talk.4.1: Unlike other Brilliant Era ruins, it is built of pure white marble.
entity.marker.852.talk.6.2: You came looking for the Holy Sword with the dream of defeating the Demon King?
entity.marker.852.talk.8.2: Trade with me! I will give you power surpassing the Holy Sword!
entity.marker.857.talk.2.1: The difference between man and beast undoubtedly lies in reason...
entity.marker.857.talk.3.1: Deep in the zone eroded by miasma here... Black City,
entity.marker.857.talk.4.1: The creatures wandering here replacing humans.... are undoubtedly beasts.
entity.marker.871.talk.2.1: A powerful magician stands in the center of the magic circle...
entity.marker.871.talk.3.2: The enemy strength in the next trial will become triple.
entity.marker.871.talk.5.2: But... if you can pass this trial, I will give you double the growth.
entity.marker.871.talk.6.2: How about it? Interested in challenging?
entity.marker.882.talk.0.1: Obtain the Holy Sword buried in the deep cave in the prophecy...
entity.marker.882.talk.1.1: You came to another target location to subjugate the Demon King...
entity.marker.882.talk.2.1: Elf Shrine... and here you will challenge the trials set by the Elf King for humanity.
entity.marker.882.talk.3.1: Pass them to get the Elf's blessing, so you can defeat the Demon King!
entity.marker.885.talk.2.2: I don't need to elaborate on your failure...
entity.marker.885.talk.3.1: You, preparing to go to the next trial...
entity.marker.885.talk.4.1: Didn't know the trial had already begun... stepping right onto a trap.
entity.marker.885.talk.5.1: So you fell into this room.
entity.marker.885.talk.6.1: Raging fire burns, countless heroic spirits surround.
entity.marker.885.talk.7.2: If you carelessly step into a trap while fighting the Demon King...
entity.marker.885.talk.8.2: What awaits you will be more than this formation!
entity.marker.885.talk.9.2: This failure... survive our attacks for 30 seconds and I'll let you off!

entity.marker.969.data.item.lore.0.1: Immediately recover all injuries on body.
entity.marker.971.data.item.lore.0.1: Gain massive buff effects at start
entity.marker.972.data.item.lore.0.1: Partner attacks can ignore enemy guardian skills.
entity.marker.973.data.item.lore.0.1: After sprinting continuously for over 3 seconds, generate storm along movement path,
entity.marker.973.data.item.lore.1.1: Storm erupts after 7 seconds, causing damage to enemies within seven blocks.
entity.marker.973.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Explosion Damage is 10% Piercing Damage x Move Speed》
entity.marker.974.data.item.lore.0.1: Partner attack power increases with remaining health.
entity.marker.975.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase damage rate with number of strong enemies defeated on journey
entity.marker.975.data.item.lore.1.1: 《+5% Damage after every strong enemy battle》
entity.marker.976.data.item.lore.0.1: Attack power equals highest partner attack power on field when holding flute in main hand,
entity.marker.976.data.item.lore.1.1: Increase all field partners' damage by 1% after each attack.
entity.marker.977.data.item.lore.0.1: Enter room with more than 10 HP
entity.marker.977.data.item.lore.1.1: Deduct 5 HP to convert to one layer of Mirage.
entity.marker.977.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Mirage: Can ignore enemy attack damage once》
entity.marker.978.data.item.lore.1.1: But when hitting enemies within 12 blocks,
entity.marker.979.data.item.lore.1.1: Change next room enemy HP, attack power based on result
entity.marker.980.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase yellow room appearance chance by 10% when refreshing
entity.marker.981.data.item.lore.0.1: Add one layer of Strength after every enemy kill,
entity.marker.981.data.item.lore.1.1: And Strength status countdown resets to 20 seconds.
entity.marker.982.data.item.lore.0.1: Do not gain armor value at start of battle,
entity.marker.982.data.item.lore.1.1: Instead gain extra HP equal to armor value.
entity.marker.983.data.item.lore.0.1: Every time Refresh Scrolls are distributed,
entity.marker.983.data.item.lore.1.1: Based on number of Refresh Scrolls held,
entity.marker.983.data.item.lore.2.1: Extra one Refresh Scroll distributed for every ten.
entity.marker.984.data.item.lore.0.1: Guaranteed crit when enemy HP is above 75%,
entity.marker.984.data.item.lore.1.1: 3% damage generated in each crit converts to Phantom Damage,
entity.marker.984.data.item.lore.2.1: Attach Phantom Damage as additional damage during each melee attack.
entity.marker.985.data.item.lore.1.1: Can choose to summon Dark Nest Magic Sword,
entity.marker.985.data.item.lore.2.1: Magic Sword possesses indestructible property, injury interval is 3 seconds.
entity.marker.986.data.item.lore.0.1: Missed arrows automatically return to backpack after three seconds.
entity.marker.988.data.item.lore.0.1: Remove all previously obtained relic effects,
entity.marker.988.data.item.lore.1.1: And obtain triple attack power, 1.5 times piercing attack of relic count
entity.marker.990.data.item.lore.0.1: Gain 15 seconds Dolphin's Grace effect in water,
entity.marker.990.data.item.lore.1.1: And immune to hunger miasma threat.
entity.marker.991.data.item.lore.0.1: When falling into pitch black abyss,
entity.marker.991.data.item.lore.1.1: Immune to abyss damage and gain Slow Falling for 15 seconds.
entity.marker.995.talk.2.1: Three curse casters stand in the center of the room.
entity.marker.995.talk.3.1: It feels like the scene of a dark ritual here.
entity.marker.995.talk.4.2: We once faced the Demon King directly... but were miserably killed by him.
entity.marker.995.talk.5.2: The Demon King possesses magic skills far stronger than the three of us.
entity.marker.995.talk.6.2: Therefore one person cannot reproduce it, but the three of us together can.
entity.marker.995.talk.7.2: Dodge our magic and defeat us!
entity.marker.1006.talk.2.1: Lanterns arranged all over the sky like stars...
entity.marker.1006.talk.3.1: It is a common sight in the Black City...
entity.marker.1006.talk.4.1: And who is the person who lit these lanterns...
entity.marker.1007.talk.2.1: The person who can break through the Elf Shrine trial...
entity.marker.1007.talk.3.1: Must be a genius who appears once every ten... no... twenty years.
entity.marker.1007.talk.4.1: ...Is this blessing something that cannot be easily given?
entity.marker.1007.talk.5.1: ...Or does the Elf King not want people to challenge the Demon King easily?
entity.marker.1007.talk.6.1: Anyway... to pass through the miasma... you still need to obtain the blessing.
entity.marker.1007.talk.7.1: Raise your weapon to face the heroic spirits before you.
entity.marker.1009.talk.1.1: Passed through many wrecks since entering the cave....
entity.marker.1009.talk.2.1: Architectural wrecks left after the collapse of the Brilliant Era....
entity.marker.1009.talk.3.1: There may be clues to the Holy Sword in these buildings,
entity.marker.1009.talk.5.1: Regardless, you won't understand anything without going in to investigate, you decide....
entity.marker.1011.talk.2.1: This place is crawling with eight-legged giant bugs.
entity.marker.1011.talk.4.1: You suffered a raid during a short rest.
entity.marker.1011.talk.5.1: Paralyzed all over and unable to move, then brought into this nest.
entity.marker.1011.talk.6.1: Fortunately... the paralysis poison seems to be fading,
entity.marker.1024.talk.2.1: In this cave... there are countless ruins,
entity.marker.1024.talk.3.1: These Brilliant Era ruins are cleverly placed here,
entity.marker.1024.talk.4.1: Concealing the true location of the Holy Sword...
entity.marker.1024.talk.5.1: Next time... next time I will definitely find it...
entity.marker.1024.talk.7.1: Persuading yourself, you start facing the monsters ambushing outside the ruins...
entity.marker.1025.talk.2.1: One wrong step and you will fall into the abyss with no return....
entity.marker.1025.talk.4.1: There are powerful relics on the other side of the abyss.
entity.marker.1025.talk.5.1: For the subsequent adventure you decide....
entity.marker.1031.talk.2.1: Towering giant trees penetrating the room.....
entity.marker.1031.talk.3.1: Making the whole space entwined with greenery and harmony.
entity.marker.1031.talk.5.2: So I will let you move forward again...
entity.marker.1031.talk.7.1: Wary of the possibility of a trap... you confront the caster.
entity.marker.1031.talk.8.2: How many times have you forced yourself forward to save the world...
entity.marker.1031.talk.9.2: Can you really last to the end like this?
entity.marker.1031.talk.10.2: Enough... even if you shoulder a mission, you should rest.
entity.marker.1033.talk.1.2: You are qualified to obtain one relic from here!
entity.marker.1033.talk.2.1: Thought it was the next Trial Chamber...
entity.marker.1033.talk.3.1: Unexpectedly heard this sentence as soon as entering the room...
entity.marker.1033.talk.4.1: Is this a trial? Maybe, yes... this is indeed a trial.
entity.marker.1033.talk.5.2: Watch your choice, once decided you cannot go back.
entity.marker.1033.talk.6.1: Getting unsuitable power will only become a shackle... choose the best relic carefully from them!
entity.marker.1034.talk.2.1: The Elf Shrine manifests the appearance of past heroes with the Elf King's power.
entity.marker.1034.talk.3.1: Fighting them is a trial and also growth.
entity.marker.1034.talk.4.1: Turn these experiences into food for subjugating the Demon King.
entity.marker.1035.talk.1.2: Person of courage who wishes to challenge the Demon King...
entity.marker.1035.talk.2.2: Thou should distinguish the boundary between courage and recklessness!
entity.marker.1035.talk.3.1: A towering goblet of fire stands in the center of the room...
entity.marker.1035.talk.4.1: Emitting a voice full of majesty from within...
entity.marker.1035.talk.5.2: Here you have a choice, get more rewards... but must also pay a price.
entity.marker.1035.talk.6.2: Each reward obtained will reduce your current health by 10%.
entity.marker.1035.talk.7.2: And relics will reduce your current health by 30%.
entity.marker.1035.talk.8.2: Or do not act as a reckless person... get no rewards, I will restore all your injuries.
entity.marker.1037.talk.1.1: This is an underground chamber full of spring
entity.marker.1037.talk.2.1: The peaceful scenery makes one forget the chaos on the ground
entity.marker.1038.talk.2.1: Entering the chamber through the heavy door...
entity.marker.1038.talk.3.1: Bright lights and clearly organized streets...
entity.marker.1038.talk.4.1: Bustling crowds coming and going as if in a town...
entity.marker.1038.talk.6.1: This is an underground town built by refugees hiding in caves at the end of the Brilliant Era...
entity.marker.1038.talk.7.1: You ask the village chief with a glimmer of hope... about clues to the Holy Sword.
entity.marker.1038.talk.8.2: Ah... knowing where the Holy Sword is... this is difficult.
entity.marker.1038.talk.9.1: The village chief sizes you up with a hesitant expression.
entity.marker.1038.talk.10.2: How about this... the village has been harassed by many monsters recently...
entity.marker.1038.talk.11.2: If you can solve the monsters for us... I will tell you... everything we know
entity.marker.1038.talk.12.1: You are surprised... this might be the only chance to know the whereabouts of the Holy Sword.
entity.marker.1041.talk.3.1: Stepping into the cave room... a loud voice sounds!
entity.marker.1041.talk.4.1: A group of fierce-looking people surrounded from around....
entity.marker.1041.talk.5.2: Another idiot attracted by the rumors of the Holy Sword!
entity.marker.1041.talk.6.2: Look at you empty-handed, probably found nothing!
entity.marker.1041.talk.7.2: But even if you found the Holy Sword it's useless....
entity.marker.1041.talk.8.2: Because I, the Great Bandit - Bind, will snatch it from your hands!
entity.marker.1048.talk.2.1: Erasure of giant mountains with sword flash... killing the Demon Army with one flash.
entity.marker.1048.talk.3.1: You recall the legends after the collapse of the Brilliant Era...
entity.marker.1048.talk.4.1: The person who held back countless Demon Armies alone, covering the people's retreat...
entity.marker.1048.talk.5.1: Roaming with sword skills that erase everything... thus named
entity.marker.1048.talk.7.2: Cross me... this is the minimum threshold to defeat the Demon King!
entity.marker.1052.talk.1.1: This is a room full of greenery.
entity.marker.1052.talk.2.1: The breath of nature refreshes you.
entity.marker.1052.talk.3.1: You realized this is a Training Chamber...
entity.marker.1052.talk.4.1: Feel the aura here, feel the flow of all things...
entity.marker.1059.talk.2.2: In that dark era... even I could become a hero.
entity.marker.1059.talk.3.1: The Necromancer who trampled life and manipulated bodies of the dead - Zombie.
entity.marker.1059.talk.4.1: But... when destruction came, he led the army of the dead to block the Demon King's advance.
entity.marker.1059.talk.5.1: Perhaps the one who saved the most lives at the end of the Brilliant Era... was him
entity.marker.1059.talk.6.2: That was just dealing with guys who got in my way.
entity.marker.1059.talk.7.2: Defeating me is the trial given to you by the Elf?
entity.marker.1059.talk.8.2: But that is impossible, you have no chance of winning before my army!
entity.marker.1062.talk.1.1: Stepped into an open garden while moving and exploring in the Black City...
entity.marker.1062.talk.2.1: You are exceptionally on guard against attacks, because...
entity.marker.1062.talk.3.1: Moving in areas with wide vision is exceptionally easy to be discovered by Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.1062.talk.5.1: Look... a group of enemies came immediately
entity.marker.1062.talk.6.1: A group of exceptionally distorted winged Deathbeasts...
entity.marker.1063.talk.3.1: This is a Black City room full of abnormalities,
entity.marker.1063.talk.4.1: Unlike other Black City rooms, it is built of pure white marble.
entity.marker.1063.talk.5.1: The result of being attracted and walking in is seeing... it.
entity.marker.1063.talk.6.2: The Holy Sword condensing the pinnacle of human technology of the Brilliant Era...
entity.marker.1063.talk.7.2: The blessing added by the Elf King personally for the hero...
entity.marker.1063.talk.8.2: But still not enough... this alone cannot defeat the Demon King!
entity.marker.1063.talk.9.2: Trade with me! I will give you power surpassing everything in the past!
entity.marker.1076.data.item.lore.0.1: When taking fatal damage after entering room each time
entity.marker.1076.data.item.lore.1.1: Survive with 1 HP remaining only once
entity.marker.1076.data.item.lore.2.1: And be invincible for ten seconds.
entity.marker.1077.data.item.lore.0.1: Within 5 seconds of defeating an enemy in battle,
entity.marker.1077.data.item.lore.2.1: Increased crit rate decays over time.
entity.marker.1078.data.item.lore.0.1: When initially summoning partner in room while crouching,
entity.marker.1079.data.item.lore.0.1: Unconsumed arrows can enter next round of battle
entity.marker.1079.data.item.lore.1.1: 《Max carry amount is 50% of Arrow Count Stat》
entity.marker.1080.data.item.lore.0.1: Overflow damage when killing enemy with melee
entity.marker.1080.data.item.lore.1.1: Attacks enemies within surrounding ten blocks with 30%.
entity.marker.1081.data.item.lore.0.1: Convert broken armor in battle to piercing damage,
entity.marker.1081.data.item.lore.1.1: But consume half of fragment amount after each attack.
entity.marker.1082.data.item.lore.0.1: Automatically dismiss summon before partner takes huge damage requiring rest...
entity.marker.1082.data.item.lore.1.1: But must wait 30 seconds before resummoning.
entity.marker.1083.data.item.lore.1.1: Attach unborn Dark Wolf Soul to your attack,
entity.marker.1083.data.item.lore.2.1: Obtain half of Sacrificial Wolf's attack power.
entity.marker.1084.data.item.lore.2.1: And slightly knock back surrounding enemies.
entity.marker.1085.data.item.lore.0.1: Based on combo count on same object,
entity.marker.1085.data.item.lore.1.1: Increase attack damage by 3% each time.
entity.marker.1085.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Accumulation interrupted if missed for over 2 seconds.》
entity.marker.1086.data.item.lore.2.1: Increase crit damage by up to 30% more
entity.marker.1087.data.item.lore.0.1: Arrow power is higher when remaining arrows are fewer,
entity.marker.1088.data.item.lore.0.1: Generate a sword mark in place every 20 blocks run,
entity.marker.1088.data.item.lore.1.1: Sword mark disappears after dealing damage and knockback to monster.
entity.marker.1088.data.item.lore.2.1: Sword Mark Damage is Attack Damage x Move Speed
entity.marker.1089.data.item.lore.0.1: Produce large explosion of over seven blocks range based on partner remaining HP
entity.marker.1089.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Explosion damage cap is double partner attack power.》
entity.marker.1090.data.item.lore.0.1: Produce sonic roar of seven blocks range based on double partner attack power
entity.marker.1091.data.item.lore.0.1: Remove Darkness, Blindness effects on blessing holder.
entity.marker.1093.data.item.lore.1.1: But attack power rises with attack speed.
entity.marker.1093.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Attack Power = 50% Base Attack Power x Attack Speed》
entity.marker.1094.data.item.lore.0.1: Crit damage and crit rate reduced to 20%,
entity.marker.1094.data.item.lore.1.1: But pursue with one slash in every slash.
entity.marker.1095.data.item.lore.0.1: Attack power is 150% of base attack power
entity.marker.1095.data.item.lore.1.1: And give hit monster huge slowness for three seconds.
entity.marker.1095.data.item.lore.2.1: 《Slowness cooldown for each monster is fifteen seconds》
entity.marker.1096.data.item.lore.0.1: Attack pierces extra 30 monster armor in melee.
entity.marker.1097.data.item.lore.0.1: Melee damage rate stacks crit rate.
entity.marker.1098.data.item.lore.0.1: Deal 25% crit damage even without triggering crit in melee.
entity.marker.1099.data.item.lore.0.1: When arrows do not Miss and continuously hit same target,
entity.marker.1099.data.item.lore.2.1: And recover all arrows of that rapid fire when monster dies.
entity.marker.1101.data.item.lore.0.1: Arrow attack can remove 4 points of enemy armor value.
entity.marker.1102.data.item.lore.0.1: HP lost when taking damage reduced to 30%.
entity.marker.1103.data.item.lore.0.1: 50% of armor lost in battle converts to attack damage.
entity.marker.1105.data.item.lore.0.1: Your every attack can increase damage to that monster when attacked by partner by 5%.
entity.marker.1105.data.item.lore.1.1: Partner's every attack can increase damage to that monster when attacked by you by 5%.
entity.marker.1107.data.item.lore.0.1: Damage you take will be shared with summoned partner,
entity.marker.1107.data.item.lore.1.1: But when your HP is less than 25%, all is borne by partner.
entity.marker.1108.data.item.lore.0.1: Switch with F to summon Sniper Arrow Spirit - Sniper.
entity.marker.1108.data.item.lore.2.1: And can attack all enemies at once.
entity.marker.1109.data.item.lore.0.1: Camp rest recovery effect becomes double.
entity.marker.1110.data.item.lore.0.1: Sprint continuously for over three seconds,
entity.marker.1110.data.item.lore.1.1: Give nearest enemy upon stopping movement
entity.marker.1110.data.item.lore.2.1: Melee physical damage of 170% of own current HP.
entity.marker.1111.data.item.lore.0.1: When enemy steps on landed arrow,
entity.marker.1111.data.item.lore.1.1: Give enemies within three blocks piercing damage of five times user's arrow damage
entity.marker.1111.data.item.lore.2.1: And give Weakness I for 20 seconds.
entity.marker.1112.data.item.lore.0.1: Based on number of statuses attached to enemy in melee,
entity.marker.1112.data.item.lore.1.1: Give extra 20% physical damage for each status.
entity.marker.1113.data.item.lore.0.1: Give enemy random negative status for 10 seconds upon crit,
entity.marker.1113.data.item.lore.1.1: Slowness, Blindness, Weakness, Armor Break, Poison, Wither....
entity.marker.1114.data.item.lore.0.1: Tear enemy's old wound again upon slash,
entity.marker.1114.data.item.lore.1.1: Based on time interval of previous slash to that enemy..
entity.marker.1114.data.item.lore.2.1: Add 10% piercing attack damage per second.
entity.marker.1115.data.item.lore.0.1: Increase damage based on number of partners on field,
entity.marker.1115.data.item.lore.2.1: Summoned partners on field bonus extra 20% physical damage.
entity.marker.1116.data.item.lore.1.1: And speed up arrow velocity by 10%.
entity.marker.1117.data.item.lore.1.1: Ignore enemy armor value of half piercing damage.
command_storage.item.tag.display.Lore[0]: An ordinary adventurer seeking an ending,
command_storage.item.tag.display.Lore[1]: Pick up the bow and embark on the journey.
command_storage.fback.tag.display.Lore[1: Pick up the sword and embark on the journey.
command_storage.mysum.slot_33_tag.displa: If you don't like the stage reward after battle you can refresh,
Refreshing relic reward requires 3 Refresh Scrolls.
command_storage.mysum.slot_29_tag.displa: Refreshing stat reward requires 1 Refresh Scroll.
soso.advancements.attup.root.2: List all stats in the world
soso.advancements.goto.11room.4: After the collapse of the Brilliant Era, the human survival sphere shrank rapidly,
soso.advancements.goto.11room.6: Causing a large number of rogue refugees...
soso.advancements.goto.11room.8: The existence of bandit groups is not rare in this era.
soso.advancements.goto.11room.10: Among them, Twilight is a dangerous element of darkness within darkness,
soso.advancements.goto.11room.12: Powerful combat power and countless members...
soso.advancements.goto.11room.14: And the danger of the leader who controls them - Bind
soso.advancements.goto.11room.16: Makes the government helpless against them.
soso.advancements.goto.13room.2: Avoid monster rooms and enter relic room...
soso.advancements.goto.177relic.4: Knowing the ending of being swallowed, used the last strength to commit suicide with the sword in hand...
soso.advancements.goto.177relic.6: Weapon made of top-grade materials, and the resentment lodged in it...
soso.advancements.goto.177relic.8: Accidentally formed a magic sword with the Demon King as the target of the curse...
soso.advancements.goto.177relic.10: The difficult-to-destroy magic sword was finally sealed deep in the Black City...
soso.advancements.goto.17room.2: Even knowing remaining life will be less than three points, still choose to be hit by giant rock...
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.4: The Gatekeeper of the Holy Sword, the Watcher of the World's End...
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.6: The Three Saints gathered all their strength to create the Holy Sword Guard...
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.8: Huge body of more than thirty meters, with the Holy Sword as the core fuel furnace
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.10: Can release sword flashes of high heat and high damage, a difficult enemy to deal with
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.12: The Holy Statue is the origin and end point of the Holy Sword, when the holder dies,
soso.advancements.goto.1boss.14: The Holy Sword will return to the Holy Statue, and the Holy Sword Trial will unfold again
soso.advancements.goto.22room.4: Spider groups living deep in the unexplored regions untouched by humans,
soso.advancements.goto.22room.6: Ferocious paralyzing fangs, tough spider silk...
soso.advancements.goto.22room.8: And the eight long spears wielded by the adult's huge body
soso.advancements.goto.22room.12: The insect nest is still expanding endlessly today...
soso.advancements.goto.22room.14: The death of a magic spider is actually not a big blow to them...
soso.advancements.goto.22room.16: After all, it is just the loss of one adult in a huge group...
soso.advancements.goto.27room.2: Did not dodge the arrow formation but killed all the guards...
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.4: The Elf race is a race that governs concepts...
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.6: Born with the ability to use a powerful authority...
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.8: And can give the hero blessing to be unaffected by miasma...
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.10: In the long confrontation, the clan chose a hero, granted the elf blessing,
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.12: Then embarked on the journey together, eventually fading from the world...
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.14: Only Elf was left behind, witnessing the demise of the clan, she
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.16: Clearly knows how distant a delusion defeating the Demon King is,
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.18: But to this day... she still has to follow the heroes' desires
soso.advancements.goto.2boss.20: Pushing them into the land of death...
soso.advancements.goto.2room.6: Possesses a tall body unlike a dwarf...
soso.advancements.goto.2room.8: Good at wielding giant axes with a strong body to charge and annihilate enemies,
soso.advancements.goto.2room.10: His special skill of double jumping in the air is flexible beyond imagination
soso.advancements.goto.2room.12: Unimaginable that he is a dwarven warrior.
soso.advancements.goto.34room.4: Like the Sword Emperor of the Brilliant Trinity - the Last Emperor,
soso.advancements.goto.34room.6: he was a powerful swordsman known as a corner of the Extreme Sword in his time...
soso.advancements.goto.34room.8: Those who touched his sword's might would turn into nothingness.
soso.advancements.goto.34room.10: At the time of the Brilliant Apocalypse, to resist the endless emergence from the border
soso.advancements.goto.34room.12: of the Dead Beast hordes, he swung his sword, swung his sword... blindly swung his sword
soso.advancements.goto.34room.14: until he died of exhaustion. The Dead Beasts could not inflict
soso.advancements.goto.37room.4: A Necromancer who manipulated corpses and played with the dead,
soso.advancements.goto.37room.6: hid in the mountains of the border studying forbidden arts before the collapse of the Brilliant Era.
soso.advancements.goto.37room.8: During the Apocalypse War, shortly after the Trinity was defeated by the Demon King and the front lines collapsed,
soso.advancements.goto.37room.10: he led a tide of corpses like a raging sea to charge at the Demon King and the army of Dead Beasts,
soso.advancements.goto.37room.12: holding the battle line alone for three days and nights, giving the defeated army time to retreat,
soso.advancements.goto.37room.14: however... after that war, Rombie was no longer of this world.
soso.advancements.goto.38relic.6: Intended to improve the agility of the Guardian Statues, but a failure that lost its original superior defensive performance...
soso.advancements.goto.38relic.8: Inferior as a combat humanoid, unable to function as a guard, thus abandoned and neglected...
soso.advancements.goto.38relic.10: A destiny that should have been abandonment was changed because of you...
soso.advancements.goto.40room.2: Defeat the Heroic Spirits waiting in the Trap Room...
soso.advancements.goto.43room.4: The Shadow Hero of the Brilliant underside, possessing powerful stealth capabilities.
soso.advancements.goto.43room.6: Although he did not play a role in the Apocalypse War...
soso.advancements.goto.43room.8: Before a stalemate was formed between the Solitary Elf King and the Demon King,
soso.advancements.goto.43room.10: he took a Blessing and crossed the Death Miasma,
soso.advancements.goto.43room.12: using his power of stealth to defeat a large number of high-ranking ferocious Dead Beasts.
soso.advancements.goto.43room.14: Many Dead Beasts transcending human wisdom were turned into corpses beneath his blade
soso.advancements.goto.43room.16: before they could even make their debut...
soso.advancements.goto.44room.2: Continually choose in the Room of the Trial Chalice until Life and Death is triggered...
soso.advancements.goto.46room.2: Break through a flight distance of over 300 blocks in the High Altitude Trial...
soso.advancements.goto.50room.4: A beautiful mage who made heroes linger and forget to return - Sleepin,
soso.advancements.goto.50room.6: Not only beauty... she also possessed magic power not inferior to the Sages of the time,
soso.advancements.goto.50room.8: She perished while bringing up the rear to cover her companions...
soso.advancements.goto.50room.10: Having a personal friendship with the Elf King, she was entrusted to dissuade
soso.advancements.goto.50room.12: the seeds of heroes with insufficient will from their journey to subjugate the Demon King
soso.advancements.goto.50room.14: using her proud beauty and dream magic...
soso.advancements.goto.54room.2: Survive the final round of the Dark Burial Cross, proving that even after losing proud power, you can struggle to the end and achieve victory...
soso.advancements.goto.56room.2: Defeat a strong enemy empowered to triple abilities by the Phantom Spirit Lord...
soso.advancements.goto.62room.22: Die die die die die die die die
soso.advancements.goto.62room.24: The final form of humanity eroded by the Demon King's Death Miasma...
soso.advancements.goto.62room.26: At the beginning of the Great War, there was not much understanding of the threat of the miasma...
soso.advancements.goto.62room.28: Humans were easily swallowed by the Death Miasma, turning into Dead Beasts...
soso.advancements.goto.66room.2: Stay in the Spring of Life for over 100 seconds and obtain all rewards...
soso.advancements.goto.67room.4: Even in an era of collapse, heroic poems can still bring hope to
soso.advancements.goto.67room.6: listeners. Wielding black and white twin swords, adventuring with a cold and proud
soso.advancements.goto.67room.8: archer and a noble saintess... Passing the trial of the Sword Spirit,
soso.advancements.goto.67room.10: defeating the Three Great Dead Beasts, embarking on the journey to subjugate the Demon King...
soso.advancements.goto.67room.14: But... the end of the hero outside the poem is always exceptionally desolate............
soso.advancements.goto.77room.4: A Count mastering illusions and destruction. No one knows who the Count was before becoming a Dead Beast,
soso.advancements.goto.77room.6: but the Count guarding the depths of the Black City is undoubtedly a strong enemy,
soso.advancements.goto.77room.8: luring enemies into his domain to slaughter,
soso.advancements.goto.77room.10: using superb swordsmanship combined with treacherous illusions, like a collection of beginner-killers.
soso.advancements.goto.77room.12: He has already buried many braves for the Demon King in the Black City...
soso.advancements.goto.7room.4: Weapons against the Demon King developed jointly...
soso.advancements.goto.7room.6: by Sages and Alchemists of the Brilliant Era...
soso.advancements.goto.7room.8: Possessing powerful defense and able to
soso.advancements.goto.7room.10: transfer damage suffered by allies to itself.
soso.advancements.goto.7room.12: Although the body is slow, if paired
soso.advancements.goto.7room.14: properly, it is the most troublesome enemy.
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.4: Carrying everyone's expectations, the hero collected everything
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.6: possible that might be used on the road to subjugate the Demon King...
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.8: Holy Swords, Blessings... and the most trustworthy travel companion, himself.
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.10: Precisely because he knew deeply how much effort he had put in, he could say... that person
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.12: should not fail. Pursuing the reason for the failure of the brave who mastered the black and white twin swords
soso.advancements.goto.88relic.14: and possessed superb swordsmanship became the driving force for Sniper

soso.functions.mob.do.area1boss.end.loop: Adventurer
...You have proven your strength!
You possess the qualifications to obtain the Holy Sword!
As the declaration is made, the pedestal rises from the ground.
The powerful Holy Sword stands tall, its infinite power felt without even touching it.
The Holy Sword... is the supreme artifact created by my Lord...
It can transform into the optimal form according to the wielder's experience!
Take it. The divine power contained in the Holy Sword is incomparable to mundane things, and moreover...
Examining the powerful Holy Sword in hand, possessing this absolute power... what else can stand in the way of subjugating the Demon King?
The Holy Sword will absolutely not betray humanity...
May you fulfill our long-cherished wish, and save humanity along with the failed ones of the past...
...Unbreaking Will... Eh... this is... a form of Holy Sword never seen before...
A Holy Sword that manifests human talent... If you had talent for the sword, it would become the strongest sword
If you had talent for the bow, it would become the strongest bow
However you... could it be your only talent is effort?
Although it could still be forcibly transformed into other forms, you believe it is fine to maintain this form.
Come to think of it... your sword is not inferior to any hero in history...
If you have no talent for the sword, yet reached this extraordinary realm solely by effort...
Then this so-called effort is undoubtedly a powerful talent as well...
You did not choose wrongly. This unshaped Holy Sword will bloom together with your talent... 'Effort'...
Go... 'Effort' to defeat the Demon King...

soso.functions.mob.do.area2boss.end.loop: ...It seems that no matter what is said, you will not stop your steps.
At least... let this Concubine offer the Blessing most suitable for you!
A Blessing condensed from huge power, shining with colorful brilliance.
Remember... even with this Concubine's Blessing, do not be negligent.
Over a long time, this Concubine has granted similarly powerful Blessings to many heroes...
But they all failed. When we met again, it was already beyond the River Styx, or even worse...
Suppressing the feeling of omnipotence brought by the Blessing, carefully listen to every word the Elf King says.
Some heroes were completely erased from this world, not even leaving residual dregs of their souls...
The Demon King... will not show mercy to those who resist him...
...I only hope you can end all this.
Fading Dark... truly a rare Blessing to see.
It can sweep away all darkness for you, leading you to see the truth...
Take it... perhaps it can guide you when you are lost...
But... it is almost useless in battle. I would recommend other choices...
Chose this Blessing by intuition, but whether this is the correct choice... you have no way of knowing...
Follow the intuition in your heart?...
You should believe in your own intuition, for you are the hero who can defeat this Concubine...
Continue forward and cross the battlefield... I only hope you can end all this.
Chose another Blessing based on advice.
The result of failure will be erasure by the Demon King without even leaving soul dregs...
...Please stop your steps.
......Since the beginning of the war, I have seen many heroes, the heroic spirit radiating from their swords without exception
However, your sword is just a mortal's sword... an extremely plain sword achieved by blind effort and training.
Defeating me is already close to the limit... but to reach a realm above this... is...
Is that so... indeed adventurers who come here... without exception, you are all 'Heroes'...
Fading Dark... surely it is this Blessing...
Take it...! It can guide you when you are lost...
This is undoubtedly the most suitable Blessing for you!
Although there are more flashy Blessings... you still picked the Blessing closest to your essence.
Please don't push yourself too hard...
Whether you can subjugate the Demon King or not, in this Concubine's eyes, you are undoubtedly 'Heroes'...
This Concubine... is no longer willing to see the result of your deaths.
Feeling your limits, you chose a Blessing more suitable for combat.
Sword Annihilating Mountains and Rivers, Zero Sword Rilo!
Shadow of Dark Night, Shadow Assassin Shadow!

soso.functions.mob.do.area3boss.end.loop: Under the protection of the Blessing, you pierced the chaotic body with the Holy Sword.
The Demon King stopped moving... this is your victory.
The Demon King's battered body will presumably collapse and return to the earth soon.
Your adventure ends here, and thinking of this, exhaustion immediately invades.
If all goes well, you will leave this true land of death where even the Demon King's kin return to nothingness.
Then say goodbye to the companions you met on the journey one by one on the way back.
Finally return to your hometown to reunite with the reason that made you determined to start the journey.
But you know this is probably impossible...
Your adventure story has ended...
There are some elements not yet achieved...
If... you could tell others about this point... you would even trade with the Demon.
Thus belongs to
's adventure chapter ended, and so several years later....
But you were not careless at all, you remembered the words of the Demon...
Suddenly exhaustion invades... a sense of weakness and despair...
Clearly I wasn't attacked... You rack your brain thinking what is going on?
But the motivation to pursue the future in your heart is being stripped away...
The Eye of the Demon did not bring a shred of hope to break this deadlock...
There are some elements not yet achieved...
Before consciousness cut off, you thought, if... you could tell others about this point...
You would even trade with the Demon...
...Ah, wonderful......... Why did the Demon Body with numerous powerful forces only trade the eye to me...
's adventure chapter ended....
The Eye of the Demon beat once, then soon losing its host, it decayed and disintegrated.
Another hero lost their life?
And... no need to ask... failed again, right...
...'This time' too, connection with the Eye was lost at the end, was the compensation insufficient...?
Are we to push unknowing heroes into the abyss again to collect information?
......Our thinking is gradually becoming more 'Demonic'.
......No, should I say reverting?
The remaining time may not be much, to repay the 'Sin', we must see through the Demon King's trick...
Then... wait quietly, for the arrival of the next hero!
Was I attacked?... When exactly?
...Calm down, having come this far, how can it end like this.
Calm your mind and follow the guidance of the Blessing, fade away the darkness circling in your heart...
What is this? This form of the Demon King...
The spewing miasma becomes even more ferocious...
As if burning itself, it spews Dark Miasma all around...
Were it not for the Fading Dark Blessing, one couldn't even tell north from south in this miasma.
A dying struggle? No... the Blessing is saying... it is not so.
So... is this the beginning?
The Mud of Darkness broke free from physical constraints and returned to its original form.
The defeated Demon King was just a container to stabilize itself while the mud grew...
And the true Demon King is the darkness lurking beneath.
Just defeat this guy and it's all over!
Stand up! Raise your sword! Fight it!
Damn it...
Why can't I do such a simple thing...
Ah...
Ahhh... turns out my heart had already yielded...
Is this the truth... finally reached this step......
...It's actually miasma, the same reason the original us failed in the Apocalypse War.
Thought it was already an overcome problem under the protection of the Blessing.
A stronger Blessing? No, can't do it...... Despair...
Despair...
......Then how to overcome this obstacle?
...Will... The Will to defeat the Demon King no matter the future!
The Will to defeat the Demon King even if giving up one's self!!
The Will to defeat the Demon King even if alone!!
The Will to defeat the Demon King even if covered in wounds!!
Or perhaps... the Will to never compromise with evil existence regardless of temptation!!
Then let's begin! To cultivate Will!
Let us truly become Demons, and grant the heroes a trial!
The Demon King stopped moving... yet this is the beginning!
Stand firm... wait for the next change
The spewing miasma obscured vision, but was dispersed under the operation of the Fading Dark Blessing...
But the monster before eyes possessing such huge power made the raised sword unconsciously lower...
Stand up... Raise the sword... Don't be crushed by fear...
The sword responded to the holder's Will, slowly but once again pointing at the Demon King.
Recall the reason I tried my best...
To become a hero named in history...?
To obtain wealth wrapped around the waist...?
Just because...
I have someone I must protect... that is why I chose to raise the sword!
The trembling blade gradually calmed, and then... the battle between 'Hero' and 'Demon King'...
Began once again.
The Holy Sword pierced the Demon King's body...
The miasma eruption that overflowed like a spring gradually subsided.
This is a feat no one has achieved in three hundred years...
But you know deeply this is not a great achievement you could achieve alone...
People of the Brilliant Era who prepared weapons against destruction...
Heroic spirits who dedicated their souls after death to protect the era...
Heroes who fought the Demon King and uncovered his secrets.
Precisely because you received so much help, you could defeat the Demon King here...
Sheathe the sword, the battle is over... you defeated the Demon King!
So what next.........?
Silently drawing a blueprint for a beautiful future, but first... the first thing you decide to do...
Reunite with the reason that made you raise the sword!
The spewing miasma obscured vision, despairing darkness shrouded over consciousness...
In front of this monster with huge power, how insignificant is human power...
But the sword showed no trace of movement.
Ah... I lost, lost to the fear of the Demon King...
Consciousness gradually goes blank......
Everything is buried in darkness......
......The throbbing in the chest prompts your Will to awaken.
※Heart of the Demon Awoken New Relic Effect: Heartbeat Assault: Liberate damage conversion limit to unlimited.
Sure enough, these relics still maintain a connection with you all...
If one person's Will is insufficient...
Then collect the Wills of many...!
Reopen the crimson eyes belonging to the Demon...
※Eye of the Demon Awoken New Relic Effect: Demonic Pressure: Freeze movement of all surrounding creatures weaker than self for three seconds when taking damage.
Scarlet blood color filtered the pitch black of fear...
Try raising the sword to aim at the Demon King again...
The process was unexpectedly light and simple...
※Demon Scale Awoken New Relic Effect: Unequal Scale: Damage result reduced to 10% when taking damage, but own damage remains 10% for ten seconds.
I... no...... We will defeat you!
Reunite with the heroes who support you!
But wasn't this known long ago?...
There are many unreasonable tragedies playing out in the world...
Are you going to ignore them because the enemy's power is stronger than yours?...
Raise the sword, resist...
Precisely because I cannot ignore it... isn't that why I stand here?
Staring at the Demon King hiding in the darkness...
The raised sword was put down once, but now it points straight at the Demon King......
The flame of resistance was not extinguished but grew stronger......
Next... the battle between 'Hero' and 'Demon King'...
Bring the news of world peace to everyone!

soso.functions.room.event.15b.3: It just so happens that the surroundings are an old abandoned mine.
soso.functions.room.event.15b.4: You attempted to plunder resources from monsters.
soso.functions.room.event.15b.5: 《Defeat Mine Corpses to obtain three Iron Ingots.》
soso.functions.room.event.15b.7: Successfully repaired the Guardian Statue, and at the same time...

soso.functions.room.event.15b.11: But it was worth it... you obtained a powerful relic.
soso.functions.room.event.17.2: 【Deduct current HP by 50% of Max HP, ❤-4】

soso.functions.room.event.17b.2: The Rock quickly crashed into you...

soso.functions.room.event.17b.5: Successfully avoided the Rock's direct hit...

soso.functions.room.event.17b.9: But your arrow snapped and became unusable.
