soso.functions.room.event.19b.1: You rested under the giant tree in the center of the chamber
soso.functions.room.event.19b.7: Haven't seen a human in a long time!
soso.functions.room.event.19b.12: Catch Mischievous Pixies. For every three fairies caught, get one random stat bonus!
soso.functions.room.event.19b.14: You lay on the comfortable grass...
soso.functions.room.event.19b.15: Falling into a deep, peaceful sleep...
soso.functions.room.event.19b.16: Something seemed to pass by during this time.
soso.functions.room.event.19b.17: When you woke up, you noticed an extra relic on the pedestal next to you.
soso.functions.room.event.19b.18: You have no attachment to the scenery...
soso.functions.room.event.19b.19: Directly crossed the chamber to continue the journey to find the Holy Sword...
soso.functions.room.event.22.1: 《1》Fight the spiders so no more sacrifices occur.
soso.functions.room.event.22.3: 《2》Bide your time and wait for a better opportunity.
soso.functions.room.event.22.5: 《3》Force your body to flee the nest
soso.functions.room.event.22.6: 【Lose current HP by 20% of Max HP.】
soso.functions.room.event.22b.1: Driving your body paralyzed by poison... you tried to resist the spiders in the nest
soso.functions.room.event.22b.2: The ferocious spiders discovered your actions...
soso.functions.room.event.22b.4: Even with a paralyzed body, you still defeated all spiders,
soso.functions.room.event.22b.5: Then you carefully examined the surroundings and saw...
soso.functions.room.event.22b.6: Countless relics remained in the center of the nest. It seems this choice was unexpectedly profitable.
soso.functions.room.event.22b.7: Long waiting wears down the spirit...
soso.functions.room.event.22b.8: Fortunately, you were not attacked by spiders during this time...
soso.functions.room.event.22b.9: Later, you quietly stood up when the spiders stopped moving late at night.
soso.functions.room.event.22b.10: Before preparing to flee the nest, you found a special relic in the center of the nest.
soso.functions.room.event.22b.11: You drove your body paralyzed by poison to try to leave the nest...
soso.functions.room.event.22b.12: Although you suffered some minor injuries... you avoided the result of becoming spider food.
soso.functions.room.event.24.1: 《1》Dive into the water to find sunken treasure.
soso.functions.room.event.24.4: 【Body became stronger, randomly increase ⚔, ❤ stats 3 times】
soso.functions.room.event.24.5: 《3》Tie a rope to an arrow, pave a rope bridge to the opposite side.
soso.functions.room.event.24.6: 【Craftsmanship became dexterous, randomly increase ➟, ➶ stats 3 times.】
soso.functions.room.event.24b.1: You jumped into the pool regardless of danger, and found the door to the treasury hidden in the water...
soso.functions.room.event.24b.2: Before your breath ran out, you successfully opened the door and entered the treasury.
soso.functions.room.event.24b.3: Since the treasury has sunk, it is useless to stay here. You jumped into the pool and swam to the opposite bank...
soso.functions.room.event.24b.4: This seems to have exercised your body.
soso.functions.room.event.24b.5: Since the treasury has sunk, it is useless to stay here. You tied a rope to an arrow and shot it to the opposite bank...
soso.functions.room.event.24b.6: Swinging to the other side via the rope, this seems to have increased your confidence in your craftsmanship.
soso.functions.room.event.25.2: 【Deduct 50% Max HP to obtain Demon's Relic】
soso.functions.room.event.25b.1: Hearing you agree to the trade... the Demon laughed
soso.functions.room.event.25b.3: You will be satisfied with this transaction.
soso.functions.room.event.25b.5: Hearing you unwilling to trade... the Demon sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.25b.6: Then facing your surprise attack, he exclaimed!
soso.functions.room.event.25b.8: What a barbaric kid! But educating a mongrel like you is also a Demon's hobby!
soso.functions.room.event.25b.10: You defeated the evil Demon who tricked adventurers into trading and devoured them,
soso.functions.room.event.25b.11: He carried countless powerful relics on him...
soso.functions.room.event.25b.12: Must be items plundered from other adventurers...
soso.functions.room.event.25b.15: Unwilling to bear even some risk, how can you defeat the Demon King like this!
soso.functions.room.event.25b.18: Whatever, but for those who hold the Will to defeat the Demon King, we will still provide assistance!
soso.functions.room.event.25c.1: Hearing your question, the Demon was surprised and hesitated to speak...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.4: Sure enough... my Will is coming to an end.
soso.functions.room.event.25c.7: I can't even bluff anymore... you are right
soso.functions.room.event.25c.9: The powerlessness in the tone and the powerful strength you feel from the Demon are like gears that don't mesh...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.10: Is that so... the Will residing here, after suffering long years it shouldn't have, is already a candle in the wind.
soso.functions.room.event.25c.12: Trading with me won't defeat the Demon King either, the real key is the tempering of Will...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.15: The Will to raise the blade even before overwhelming power...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.18: What does this have to do with trading? The conclusion we reached is...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.21: The only ones who can do this are 'those who are willing to sacrifice their all just to fight for subjugating the Demon King'.
soso.functions.room.event.25c.23: Using oneself like a tool without caring for wear and tear, such a Will, perhaps this is the best way to deal with the Demon King in the Demon's mouth.
soso.functions.room.event.25c.25: And the person I trade with will sacrifice half their life, and this price will become the trader's realization...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.28: Realizing that one can sacrifice everything to subjugate the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.31: Eventually becoming a tool for subjugating the Demon King under repeated trades...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.33: But you find it hard to accept, at least...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.38: Hmm? ...Did you not understand what I said? Even trading with me won't defeat the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.25c.40: You are willing to trade with the person in front of you, not based on the desire to turn yourself into a machine...
soso.functions.room.event.25c.41: But wanting to inherit the Will of this person who is like a candle in the wind...
soso.functions.room.event.25d.7: Hmph! Then get lost, I don't have time to talk to a loser destined to perish in the mud.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.9: With an order carrying irresistible vigor, requiring you to leave.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.10: The thought of obeying rose in your heart, but was suppressed by you...
soso.functions.room.event.25d.15: No, before leaving I must recover what was plundered by you...
soso.functions.room.event.25d.18: Did you notice? Just borrowing some life from a dying person.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.21: Anyway, those small fry wouldn't even have the courage to complain.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.24: How about it? Doesn't this return it to you? Get lost.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.27: ...In the end, not just me, you have taken the lives of many people.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.29: Resisting... is irrational, the opponent is a Demon with bottomless strength.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.30: But so what? You raised your sword at the Demon.
soso.functions.room.event.25d.42: Get lost, loser destined to perish in the mud!
soso.functions.room.event.27.1: 《1》Maybe an important treasury, worth the challenge to cross.
soso.functions.room.event.27.2: 【Pass through arrow formation to get Rare Relic】
soso.functions.room.event.27.3: 《2》Maybe an important training ground, worth the challenge to cross.
soso.functions.room.event.27.4: 【Pass through arrow formation to get four Stat rewards.】
soso.functions.room.event.27.5: 《3》Arrow formation is dense and hard to cross, should not risk checking.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.1: A level guarded by heavy troops must be some important facility.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.2: Maybe information about the Holy Sword can be obtained from it.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.3: You steeled yourself and moved forward.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.4: Crossing the terrifying arrow formation, ahead is just as you expected...
soso.functions.room.event.27b.6: An extremely valuable ancient training ground.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.7: You began to select items suitable to take away.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.8: Excessive risk is just seeking death.
soso.functions.room.event.27b.9: You quietly closed the door to find another path.
soso.functions.room.event.28.3: 《2》Believe you can find the Holy Sword and leave the village.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.1: You waited quietly for the monster attack.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.2: If you survive this wave of attacks... you can obtain information on the Holy Sword.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.3: You steeled yourself to intercept the monsters.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.6: Thanks to your assistance, we survived the difficulty...
soso.functions.room.event.28b.9: But the location of the Holy Sword... has been buried in long history, we don't know where it is either?
soso.functions.room.event.28b.12: But to thank you... I think these should replace the insufficient information as your reward.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.20: You believed that you could find the Holy Sword with your own efforts.
soso.functions.room.event.28b.21: Refused the village chief's suspicious request and left the village.
soso.functions.room.event.32.1: 《1》Challenge the trial to obtain relics, but failure will deduct 20% of Max HP from current HP.
soso.functions.room.event.36.2: 【Sacrifice wolf pup to obtain Demon's Relic】
soso.functions.room.event.36.7: 《1》Talk to the Demon about a different trade.
soso.functions.room.event.36b.3: This is not sacrifice but reincarnation, you will be satisfied with your choice.
soso.functions.room.event.36b.6: Oh yes, the change has happened and cannot be reversed... hehe.
soso.functions.room.event.36b.18: It seems you don't understand this trade, this is not sacrifice, just a form change!
soso.functions.room.event.36c.1: Facing your request, the Demon was surprised...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.3: In these long years, this is the first time I've heard such a request...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.6: You seem to understand our affairs to a certain extent...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.9: I see... you have already met our companions.
soso.functions.room.event.36c.12: Tell me the reason... the reason to change the trade.
soso.functions.room.event.36c.15: This wolf pup is my important partner, not a trade good that can be sold...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.18: It's not because of dissatisfaction with the power to be obtained...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.21: Then I refuse to change the trade content...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.27: Why... your goal is just to cultivate the Will of self-sacrifice, right...
soso.functions.room.event.36c.30: So as long as there is sacrifice, it's the same everywhere, right?
soso.functions.room.event.36c.33: Even knowing the hidden purpose... then you should know... whatever power you gain from the trade... is irrelevant to whether you can defeat the Demon King
soso.functions.room.event.36c.36: Fine... offer half the durability of the shield protecting you, and I agree to change the trade content
soso.functions.room.event.39b.2: Oh! Daring to challenge me, you have some guts!
soso.functions.room.event.39b.5: But the reality is cruel... you cannot defeat me!
soso.functions.room.event.39b.8: Then let's begin! The battle between you and me!
soso.functions.room.event.39b.11: Ended the racing duel... seeing this score.
soso.functions.room.event.39b.13: Hey hey, your speed is no good at all...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.16: With you like this, defeating the Demon King might be a bit difficult...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.22: Although you lost the match, I think I can still give you some tips as a reward...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.25: You won the match, this was a wonderful duel...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.28: These tips are entrusted to you...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.31: I bow down, to dare to show off before you with my speed...
soso.functions.room.event.39b.34: Let me teach you all my tricks... remember to mention me after defeating the Demon King!
soso.functions.room.event.39b.36: You are unwilling to challenge... the Speed Battle Soul sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.39b.38: Self-knowledge is also a good thing!
soso.functions.room.event.39b.41: But can you really defeat the Demon King like this?!
soso.functions.room.event.44.1: 《1》Request the Chalice of Trials to heal yourself.
soso.functions.room.event.44.2: 【Full HP recovery and leave the room.】
soso.functions.room.event.44b.5: Heroes have an obligation to always maintain themselves in peak condition.
soso.functions.room.event.44b.8: Possessing powerful strength but showing flaws in front of the enemy will also lead to ruin!
soso.functions.room.event.44b.14: May your courage not become recklessness...
soso.functions.room.event.44b.17: Then... leave! The next trial awaits you.
soso.functions.room.event.46.2: 【Rewards based on height, max five Stat rewards.】
soso.functions.room.event.46b.17: Is that so... you are not interested.
soso.functions.room.event.46b.24: Hey hey, do you have any motivation...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.27: I have no rewards to give you for such reaction speed...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.30: What you can see in the air is the same as what I see on the ground...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.33: Give you some rewards as a gesture...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.36: You seem to have glimpsed something new...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.39: Looks like I should give you some rewards...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.45: Such reaction speed deserves these rewards...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.51: These rewards are all given to you...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.54: You did it! You reached the limit...
soso.functions.room.event.46b.57: You can obtain all my rewards...
soso.functions.room.event.49.1: 《1》Engage with Sniper to test his strength.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.1: Hearing you are willing to compete... Sniper raised his bow.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.3: Let me show you the strength of me, the strongest hero companion...
soso.functions.room.event.49b.12: Hearing your praise... Sniper laughed proudly
soso.functions.room.event.49b.14: A hero surpassing my strength cannot be defeated... take me with you.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.17: Although forcing myself to leave the Elf King's domain will weaken me... I want to witness the reason for his failure with my own eyes.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.20: Turns out... we are so unbearable!
soso.functions.room.event.49b.24: Looking at it this way, our defeat was only natural. Reward for accompanying me... take these.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.26: Hearing you unwilling to compete... Sniper sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.49b.28: Looks like your level is just this much...
soso.functions.room.event.49b.31: Leave, I am not interested in your strength either!
soso.functions.room.event.5.1: 《1》Turn around to duel with the strong enemy.
soso.functions.room.event.50.3: 《2》Ignore request and force through Sleepin's trial.
soso.functions.room.event.50b.1: Hearing you agree to rest... Sleepin said
soso.functions.room.event.50b.3: You will enter a deep dreamland...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.6: Forget your mission, put down what you carry...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.15: When you wake up, you will give up challenging the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.18: This is the Elf King's will, she no longer wishes to see heroes die at the hands of the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.20: Resisting sleep... resisting falling into irredeemable sweet slumber.
soso.functions.room.event.50b.28: Even though you might die at the hands of the Demon King like countless heroes in the past...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.31: Are you still unwilling to give up the challenge?
soso.functions.room.event.50b.34: Then... take it, at least it can help you a little.
soso.functions.room.event.50b.36: Hearing you unwilling to rest... Sleepin sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.50b.38: Looks like you don't intend to rest!
soso.functions.room.event.50b.41: Then let me force you to rest!
soso.functions.room.event.50b.43: You defeated Sleepin who used human nature to lure adventurers into sleep and then defeat them,
soso.functions.room.event.50b.45: Your strong Will and that power have been shown to me...!
soso.functions.room.event.50b.48: Fine... you leave! The Elf King is waiting for you...
soso.functions.room.event.50b.50: Hearing you unwilling to trade... Sleepin sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.1: Your determination caused the Cross to start operating.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.3: Then verify your ability, your most proficient power has been sealed!
soso.functions.room.event.54b.6: Then you will deal with these Heroic Spirits!
soso.functions.room.event.54b.8: The Cross stopped operating, your proud ability has been restored.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.10: How about it, want to continue challenging?
soso.functions.room.event.54b.13: Continue challenging and you will definitely gain more.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.19: Your determination caused the Cross to start operating again.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.24: After this you will become stronger!
soso.functions.room.event.54b.49: Even with powerful strength sealed, you can still splendidly defeat despair.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.52: You... can definitely defeat the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.54: Hearing you unwilling to trial... the Cross stopped operating.
soso.functions.room.event.54b.55: The Heroic Spirits gave way to let you leave...
soso.functions.room.event.55b.1: Hearing you agree to pay the price for the Potion Maniac to brew potions.
soso.functions.room.event.55b.3: These potions can make you perform better at critical moments.
soso.functions.room.event.55b.6: Hmm... although the price might pain you a bit, it is worth it... right.
soso.functions.room.event.55b.20: Hearing you unwilling to pay anything, the Potion Maniac was displeased.
soso.functions.room.event.55b.22: Progress can only be made through experiments!
soso.functions.room.event.55b.25: ...By the way, as long as I catch you as a test subject, Potionology can make greater progress!
soso.functions.room.event.55b.27: You defeated the Potion Maniac who enthusiastically promoted potions,
soso.functions.room.event.55b.28: Relying on drugs is a bad thing...
soso.functions.room.event.55b.29: You determined to walk your own path...
soso.functions.room.event.56b.1: The Phantom Spirit Lord deployed a magic circle.
soso.functions.room.event.56b.3: You will challenge a powerful strong enemy...
soso.functions.room.event.56b.6: When you pass the trial, the Spirit's Blessing will guide you to a higher level.
soso.functions.room.event.56b.10: You will challenge a powerful enemy...
soso.functions.room.event.56b.15: Hearing you unwilling to trial... the Phantom Spirit Lord sighed.
soso.functions.room.event.56b.17: What you will challenge is the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.56b.20: The Demon King that even us with multiple times strength cannot defeat!
soso.functions.room.event.5b.1: You chose to jump off the cliff...
soso.functions.room.event.5b.2: Fortunately, because there was a deep pool under the cliff, you successfully survived.
soso.functions.room.event.5b.3: This seems to be a secret realm, with a relic towering on the pedestal in its center...
soso.functions.room.event.60b.3: Those who hide in shells will forget courage.
soso.functions.room.event.60b.6: Now you are a true hero... hehe.
soso.functions.room.event.60b.18: It seems you don't understand the essence of this trade! You don't possess the qualities to defeat the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.60c.1: Hearing you agree to the trade... the Demon smiled bitterly
soso.functions.room.event.60c.3: Even knowing everything is meaningless, you still decided to trade with us.
soso.functions.room.event.60c.6: In the end... you are the only one who traded with all of us.
soso.functions.room.event.60c.9: Take it, we are waiting for you in the library of the Black City.
soso.functions.room.event.64b.1: Facing the encirclement of Dead Beasts, you showed no fear.
soso.functions.room.event.64b.2: Raise the Holy Sword to intercept them...
soso.functions.room.event.64b.3: You will let them know... who is the boss!
soso.functions.room.event.64b.4: After repelling the Dead Beast attack... the room suddenly felt much emptier...
soso.functions.room.event.64b.5: You unexpectedly found a hidden room located in a blind spot...
soso.functions.room.event.64b.6: Maybe a good place to rest...
soso.functions.room.event.64b.7: Forced through the Dead Beasts' encirclement...
soso.functions.room.event.64b.8: You are heavily injured... but this is not a problem,
soso.functions.room.event.64b.9: Compared to fighting a desperate battle,
soso.functions.room.event.64b.10: Leaving the room would be a better choice,
soso.functions.room.event.65.1: 《1》Use black material to enhance sword attack.
soso.functions.room.event.65.3: 《2》Use black material to enhance sword penetration.
soso.functions.room.event.65b.1: Picking up materials polluted by miasma...
soso.functions.room.event.65b.2: Enduring the damage of close contact with miasma,
soso.functions.room.event.65b.3: Raising the hammer high to strike... shape
soso.functions.room.event.65b.7: You silently walked away from the workshop.
soso.functions.room.event.65b.9: But the risk of using them is too high.
soso.functions.room.event.65b.10: You decided to give them up and continue moving forward.
soso.functions.room.event.66b.2: The breath of life combines with the spring water, sublimating to a higher realm,
soso.functions.room.event.66b.3: A scent like honey... attracting Dead Beasts...
soso.functions.room.event.66b.4: While enjoying the benefits of the spring... you raised your sword to intercept the Dead Beasts!
soso.functions.room.event.66b.5: Facing the swarm of Dead Beasts attacking in overwhelming numbers...
soso.functions.room.event.66b.6: You gave up continuing to stay in the spring...
soso.functions.room.event.66b.7: Cleaving a bloody path with the power of the Holy Sword...
soso.functions.room.event.66b.8: You silently moved away from the Fountain of Life.
soso.functions.room.event.66b.9: The power of the spring is indeed strong...
soso.functions.room.event.66b.10: But you already have enough power, greedy for more is just seeking destruction.
soso.functions.room.event.66b.11: You continue to explore the Black City... to defeat the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.68b.1: At the moment of touching the relic, the surrounding Dead Beasts seemed to have achieved their goal...
soso.functions.room.event.68b.3: Holding the relic... you also clearly realized...
soso.functions.room.event.68b.4: This is not something good... but indeed something that can be used.
soso.functions.room.event.68b.5: No matter how Dead Beasts are cleared, they continue to emerge...
soso.functions.room.event.68b.6: And that relic emitting an ominous aura is something that shouldn't be touched...
soso.functions.room.event.68b.7: You used the power of the Holy Sword to directly slash through the iron fence and escape the room...

soso.functions.room.event.69b.4: You silently walked away from the farmland.

soso.functions.room.event.69b.7: But hard to harvest... you decided a moderate amount is enough.
soso.functions.room.event.74.1: 《1》Cross the abyss to obtain the relic, but failure will deduct 20% of max HP from current HP and cause burn.
soso.functions.room.event.76.11: 《1》Rest in the library and search for useful information...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.1: Heavy sleepiness strikes... you cope calmly.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.4: Suddenly in the room you feel three presences staring at you...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.5: Turning to look at the tea table, three black humanoids with faint presences are staring at you...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.6: The indescribable darkness throbbing terrifies the viewer.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.10: But somehow... you can faintly see the silhouettes hiding beneath the black mist.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.12: But waiting for a long time... the opposite side seems to have no intention of attacking.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.15: Finally waited for... holder of the Blessing of Fading Dark...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.19: In this long long... confrontation with the Demon King, we contacted many heroes...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.23: Blessing of Fading Dark... probably the only Blessing that can oppose the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.27: But not enough... the Blessing of Fading Dark alone is not enough...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.31: Will... strong Will... is the key to defeating the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.35: I hope you can prove to us, your Will...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.37: 《1》Raise the Holy Sword to challenge the Demon...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.43: Yes! Defeat us, this is the best choice to prove you possess the Will to overcome despair...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.45: Setting up the Holy Sword, you face the Demon to demonstrate Will!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.47: Demonstrate your Will, make us submit!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.51: ...I see, don't know how to demonstrate strength?
soso.functions.room.event.76b.70: This way we can rest assured...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.78: Unshaped Holy Sword... limit of talent?
soso.functions.room.event.76b.82: Ha... Hahahaha... Will is the power to create infinite possibilities!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.86: Precisely because it knows you possess infinite possibilities, the Holy Sword cannot decide its appearance!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.90: We will exit here... even with the aid of Demon bodies, three hundred years is too long...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.94: Thank you... for letting us see hope at the very end...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.101: ...Your Will is insufficient to defeat the Demon King
soso.functions.room.event.76b.105: At the very end... we still couldn't wait for the key to defeating the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.117: Our Will has come to an end.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.137: Hard to understand... actually showing not a shred of hostility towards us...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.141: Can sweep away darkness and bring truth to the holder...?
soso.functions.room.event.76b.145: Never heard of it... but if such a Blessing really exists...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.153: We are Demons who have observed the Demon King since the Brilliant Era...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.157: Therefore we can guarantee that if this continues you will inevitably lose to the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.161: And this relic can bring new hope, making your journey not worthless.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.165: But to establish a connection between the relic and you, you must offer half your life...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.177: Was this also seen through by you? Yes... even if you obtain this relic...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.181: You are still destined to be defeated by the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.185: But just in case... you successfully unravel the Demon King's secret...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.189: Then I guarantee future heroes will inherit your path and continue forward...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.191: Told the cruel truth... your journey won't succeed, but end in failure...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.192: But hasn't it been like this all along? Finding the hard-to-find Holy Sword, passing the difficult Elf trials...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.193: You laughed off the Demon's footnote. You decided...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.200: Thanks... you won't regret this trade.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.208: Watch out for the Demon King's attack, especially when you think you have defeated the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.212: Sorry... for letting you bear the
soso.functions.room.event.76b.216: The words seemed to carry a trace of self-blame for their actions...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.218: I think that is not some 'Sin', you and I are both human heroes to be proud of.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.221: Although agreeing to the trade, I don't intend to give up easily.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.224: No matter what tricks the Demon King plays, I will defeat him!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.231: But fine... let me remind you... watch out for the Demon King's attack, especially when you think you have defeated the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.235: We hold high hopes for you... who have the ability to see through many things, and will give maximum assistance!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.243: Heavy sleepiness strikes... you quietly fell asleep.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.246: In the darkness you feel three presences staring at you...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.247: The crisis of life woke you up instantly...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.248: Evil aura thickly shrouded the entire space...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.249: Huge pressure made you breathless... unconsciously raising the Holy Sword...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.251: But waiting for a long time... the attack that should have come didn't start.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.254: Calmed down? ...Looks like it's possible to talk trade with us...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.258: But before that let us build trust,
soso.functions.room.event.76b.262: My name is Parfit, yes... Sage Parfit of the Brilliant Trinity...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.266: Lost your trust with the first sentence? Haha...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.270: Then you can call me Demon. Have you heard our adventure tales...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.274: Finally we defeated the demons and their kin, a beautiful heroic tale...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.278: But that was the biggest failure... we pondered how to make up for all this.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.282: Things that can rely on prior preparation are ultimately limited...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.286: And what the prophecy pointed to was in a place beyond our reach...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.290: ......So, we who dabbled in taboos, can we still call ourselves us?
soso.functions.room.event.76b.292: Unbelievable statements burst out one after another, but you ultimately have no way to verify.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.293: This is the deep part of the Black City... the only source of information is probably this Demon before you, whose authenticity is unknown.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.296: Then let's talk about the trade, if this continues you will inevitably lose to the Demon King.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.304: Demon... our bodies possess incomparably powerful strength.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.308: Claws, hooves, blood, heart... everything can become the strongest weapon.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.312: But to establish a connection between the relic and you, you must offer half your life.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.318: This price is too heavy... but there is also sufficient incentive, so you...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.333: But fine... for those who hold the Will to defeat the Demon King, we will still provide assistance!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.356: You are not confident that you won't encounter the terrifying existence that once existed in this space.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.357: But obviously your gamble was correct, peaceful sleep restored your abundant spirit.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.358: And until leaving the room, you didn't encounter anything strange.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.366: Initially... it was just a pool of small mud brought into the world from another world following the Demon invasion...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.367: An insignificant existence that even the famous Prophet could not reveal its origin.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.368: Although at that time the Sage, Prophet, and Brilliant Last Emperor defeated the Demon King together
soso.functions.room.event.76b.369: But the true crisis was stopped by no one...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.370: In light sleep, it seems someone is narrating something...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.373: Initially unconscious, it... devoured bugs that inadvertently stepped on it...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.377: Having obtained means of movement, it soon began to unscrupulously devour the surroundings...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.381: Frogs, snakes, wolves and dogs, bears and lions... then humans!
soso.functions.room.event.76b.385: However, the people who thought they had stopped the prophesied disaster were unaware...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.387: You regret your decision... thinking that holding the Holy Sword and activating the Blessing, you could always cope with crises.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.388: But these enemies in front of you make you unable to think so easily, raising the Holy Sword to guard against the arrival of attacks.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.391: Looks like before discussing the trade, I should introduce myself...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.395: I... we are those three ignorant fools, thinking we solved everything, but changed nothing...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.399: Don't trust? After all, it is this shell...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.403: But there's no helping it, even knowing the result, but... let's talk about the trade...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.407: Offer half your life, I will give you this powerful relic...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.427: Curiosity about the Black City made you decide to learn more...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.428: Just flipping through shouldn't take too long... surely can finish before that existence returns
soso.functions.room.event.76b.430: You fell into a deep coma.
soso.functions.room.event.76b.431: Greedy for short rest and staying in a dangerous place...
soso.functions.room.event.76b.432: Will only get a counterproductive result,
soso.functions.room.event.76b.434: In order not to alert that unknown existence.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.1: Heavy sleepiness strikes... you quickly immersed in dreamland.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.7: Three vermilion single eyes gazing at you, powerful evil aura attacking you directly.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.8: But the three are familiar faces...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.9: And waiting for a long time... the opposite side seems to have no intention of attacking.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.16: Everyone is radiating brilliance, powerful heroes...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.20: Without even the Blessing of Fading Dark, the outcome of challenging the Demon King is probably defeat without realizing it.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.24: To put it bluntly, we do not wish for you to continue challenging the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.28: Although you obtained huge power from our trade...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.32: But in front of the Demon King it has no meaning...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.38: Precisely because of this I wanted to trade with you.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.42: Delusional to rely on external power to whitewash fear? ......
soso.functions.room.event.76c.46: Impossible... any living thing will instinctively fear the Demon King...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.50: Unless possessing tough Will, otherwise without disregarding life and death, there is no chance of winning...
soso.functions.room.event.76c.53: You are Sage Smar, Prophet Parfit, Sword Emperor Swo of the Brilliant Trinity.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.65: Did someone mention it to you before? ......
soso.functions.room.event.76c.68: No... just because you are my admiration.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.71: Everyone has had... right, listening to stories of heroes.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.74: Then fantasizing the dream of becoming that hero in the story.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.77: You are the heroes I admire, no reason not to recognize you.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.84: I cannot disregard my own life and death, will be lost when frustrated, and often doubt if my choices are correct.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.91: The reason is just this? Completed all trades with us just for this?
soso.functions.room.event.76c.95: Ha... hahaha... even if the object of your entrustment is a hero defeated by the Demon King?
soso.functions.room.event.76c.102: Sorry... human Will is ever-changing, a little ripple can become a huge wave.
soso.functions.room.event.76c.106: We won't let you regret it, taking us as your entrustment.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.1: Picked up notes scattered in the room, and books on the shelf.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.3: Piecing together the truth bit by bit...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.8: These Demons seem to have really studied the Demon King seriously...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.9: Recorded on paper are battle records between heroes and the Demon King over these hundreds of years...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.10: Failure, failure... failure, failure continuously stacking.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.11: A few heroes reached good relationships with them, obtaining support... but...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.12: Impaled, crushed, beheaded... death continuously stacking.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.13: Where exactly did it start to go crazy...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.14: Spirit gradually dispersed during continuous reading, you fell asleep.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.26: Compared to letting those mediocre people holding hero dreams die...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.30: Better to utilize them effectively, to forge the strongest hero.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.34: As for you... although not holding hope, buying some time should be possible.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.38: The Demon King is accumulating power to launch a decisive battle against the Elf King...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.42: Remove its shell, buy some time at least...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.45: Since when did you go astray...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.52: Precisely because pursuing a better future, people have the motivation to move forward.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.55: The 'Hero' you are looking for does not exist, stop the exploitation you are conducting.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.73: Pierced the last Demon with the Holy Sword.
soso.functions.room.event.76d.74: Expectations for heroes in the long three hundred years...
soso.functions.room.event.76d.76: Thus went astray on the long journey...
soso.functions.room.event.78.2: 【Survive 100 seconds, one wave of ten monsters every twenty seconds.】
soso.functions.room.event.78b.1: Stepping into the room, you tried to release the Demon Sword's bindings...
soso.functions.room.event.78b.2: Giant Eye glared at you who tried to liberate the Demon Sword
soso.functions.room.event.78b.3: Wave after wave of Dead Beasts descended...
soso.functions.room.event.78b.4: To eliminate you who tried to save the Demon Sword.
soso.functions.room.event.78b.5: The Demon Sword flying freely in the air killed all Dead Beasts in an instant.
soso.functions.room.event.78b.6: Your attempt was successful, and this Demon Sword possessing free consciousness...
soso.functions.room.event.78b.7: Seems to intend to follow you after being liberated...
soso.functions.room.event.78b.9: Before the Giant Eye paid attention to you.
soso.functions.room.event.78b.10: For a moment... the Giant Eye stared at you trying to escape
soso.functions.room.event.78b.11: But soon turned away its gaze without interest.

soso.functions.room.event.83b.14: Since you have finished choosing... then...
soso.functions.room.event.83b.17: Defeat me, prove you possess the qualification to use the Master's treasure!
soso.functions.room.event.84b.1: Suddenly the Dead Beasts stopped moving...
soso.functions.room.event.84b.2: Immature twisted life, even if about to perish...
soso.functions.room.event.84b.3: Still acting to execute what was implanted. You have a new understanding of this abnormal life form...
soso.functions.room.event.8b.1: Resting by the clear water, body and mind recovered...
soso.functions.room.event.8b.2: But, it is time... set off again to find the Holy Sword!
soso.functions.room.event.8b.3: Having doubts about the remaining food in the backpack...
soso.functions.room.event.8b.4: Piercing the small fish swimming in the clear stream with the sword,
soso.functions.room.event.8b.8: Take it, maybe it will be useful later!
soso.functions.room.keep.5.5: Find other paths to the end!

soso.functions.room.start.25.6: Body pitch black emitting evil aura...
soso.functions.room.start.25.7: Such an opponent should be avoided if possible...
soso.functions.room.start.25.8: Thinking about such things, you chose to turn away before it discovered you...
soso.functions.room.start.25.10: Wait... have a trade with me!
soso.functions.room.start.25.12: It seems reality is not as simple as imagined, that existence sensed your presence, and spoke to you...
soso.functions.room.start.25.22: You cannot find charm in the Demon's words...
soso.functions.room.start.25.23: Maybe you can hear the Will in those words...
soso.functions.room.start.25.24: Like a candle in the wind, passing in a flash...
soso.functions.room.start.25.35: The gaze examining like evaluating a price makes you feel unpleasant from the bottom of your heart...
soso.functions.room.start.25.45: The tyrannical power emitting from the Demon...
soso.functions.room.start.25.46: The aura of a top predator greatly increased the persuasiveness of the words...
soso.functions.room.start.25.47: It is a trade very worth considering, huge red eyes staring at you, urging you to make a decision...
soso.functions.room.start.36.8: Attracted by the familiar aura and walking in, the result was meeting... it.
soso.functions.room.start.36.12: Different from expectations, didn't meet the Demon you wanted to see...
soso.functions.room.start.36.13: But another Demon... listening to those seemingly set lines...
soso.functions.room.start.36.20: You sensed that this Demon has also reached the end in the prison of time...
soso.functions.room.start.36.25: Seems not here to talk trade!
soso.functions.room.start.36.29: Sensing the disgusting atmosphere and exploring deeper
soso.functions.room.start.36.30: A Demon carrying even more superior evil aura appeared before eyes...
soso.functions.room.start.36.31: Towards you who assumed a guarding stance...
soso.functions.room.start.36.33: Fighting with me does you no good...
soso.functions.room.start.36.36: If you don't intend to trade just get out...
soso.functions.room.start.36.39: But you deliberately came to subjugate me... Hmph!
soso.functions.room.start.36.41: Foolish brave, you will pay the price for your foolishness...
soso.functions.room.start.60.4: Have a trade... no, let's save the opening remarks!
soso.functions.room.start.60.8: Knowing what encounter lies inside, you still stepped into that space.
soso.functions.room.start.60.10: Frankly speaking, trading with you has no meaning...
soso.functions.room.start.60.12: Manipulating the Will of those who accept the trade behind the scenes,
soso.functions.room.start.60.13: Making them regard themselves as 'machines that can subjugate the Demon King at all costs'.
soso.functions.room.start.60.14: This kind of thing has no meaning after being known and guarded against.
soso.functions.room.start.60.16: But I still must ask... do you agree to the trade?
soso.functions.room.start.60.26: Steeling yourself, you stepped forward into that strange space.
soso.functions.room.start.60.28: Subjugating our bases everywhere... do you think what you do is justice?
soso.functions.room.start.60.31: No... no, you are hindering us from saving this world.
soso.functions.room.start.60.34: Only we know how to defeat the Demon King, and you should just obediently be manipulated by us...
soso.functions.room.start.60.36: Facing the vicious words coming with the clamor, you knew your choice was not wrong...
soso.functions.room.start.60.37: Letting these evil Demons do mischief behind the scenes, don't know how many people will be sacrificed here...
soso.functions.room.start.60.39: Can't accept? Then let's fight, you will pay the price of blood for your foolishness!
soso.functions.room.start.76.4: Hateful aura made the Black Beasts avoid this room,
soso.functions.room.start.76.5: You are convinced that those disgusting guys once existed here...
soso.functions.room.start.76.6: Yes, those Demons who tricked ignorant people...
soso.functions.room.start.76.7: Precisely because Demons lived here for a long time, Black Beasts dare not approach this place...
soso.functions.room.start.76.8: Why do Demons who feed on humans live here...
soso.functions.room.start.76.10: Without their assistance one cannot defeat the Demon King, what is that about...

soso.functions.set.upmode.check_talk.7: This adventure, if successful, will be enough to advance history...

soso.functions.set.upmode.start.2: With the Demon King's descent upon the world... miasma spreads in the world, previous braves failed, but... you will not fail, try more possibilities to fight the Demon King...
soso.functions.set.upmode.start.4: The Brilliant Era destroyed by the hands of the Demon King, its seer... the Prophet had already seen through everything, leaving blessings for the era after destruction. But this will not last too long, as distance from the Brilliant Era grows, the blessing will fade and vanish.
soso.functions.set.upmode.upmode_up.2: Through the extraordinary efforts of past braves... history has taken another step forward.
soso.functions.set.upmode.upmode_up.3: However this era is the last chance... if the Demon King cannot be defeated, humanity will perish here.
soso.functions.set.upmode.upmode_up.4: This era is the last chance... if the Demon King cannot be defeated, humanity will perish here.
